column2: The Shaman enchants a targeted allied unit with Unbreakable, giving them bonus Attack Damage and preventing death by setting their HP to a specific value if fatal damage is received.
column3: Shaman наделяет указанного союзника эффектом Unbreakable, увеличивая его силу атаки и не позволяя умереть. При получении смертельного урона здоровье цели становится равным определенному значению.

column2:
Grants the target ^o{20,40,60} bonus Attack Damage^* and ^oprotects them from fatal damage^*. Taking fatal damage sets the target's Health to ^o{200,400,600}^*, dispels Unbreakable and places the skill on cooldown.

When not on cooldown or not on another target, ^oUnbreakable remains active indefinitely on Demented Shaman^* until fatal damage is received.

Activate and target another ally hero to ^otransfer Unbreakable's effects to them for 15 seconds^*. If the target does not receive fatal damage while Unbreakable is active on them, Demented Shaman will receive Unbreakable's effects indefinitely and Unbreakable goes on a 15 second cooldown.

If Unbreakable is ^oDispelled^* without its effects activating, Unbreakable goes on a 30 second cooldown.
column3:
Увеличивает ^oсилу атаки^* цели на ^o{20,40,60} ед.^* и ^oзащищает от смертельного урона^*. При получении смертельного урона, дает вам ^o{200,400,600} ед.^* здоровья, развеивает эффект Unbreakable, а способность начинает восстанавливаться.

Когда способность восстановлена и не на другой цели, ^oэффект Unbreakable остается активным на Demented Shaman^* до получения им смертельного урона.

Активируйте и укажите другого союзного героя, чтобы ^oпередать ему эффект Unbreakable на 15 сек.^* Если цель не получит смертельного урона за время, пока на ней активен эффект Unbreakable, Demented Shaman вернёт себе эффект Unbreakable, а способность Unbreakable восстановится за 15 сек.

Если эффект Unbreakable ^oразвеян^* без активации, способность Unbreakable восстановится за 30 сек.

column2:
Grants the target ^o{20,40,60} bonus Attack Damage^* and ^oprotects them from fatal damage^*. Taking fatal damage sets the target's Health to ^o{200,400,600}^*, dispels Unbreakable and places the skill on cooldown.

When not on cooldown or not on another target, ^oUnbreakable remains active indefinitely on Demented Shaman^* until fatal damage is received.

Activate and target another ally hero to ^otransfer Unbreakable's effects to them for 15 seconds^*. If the target does not receive fatal damage while Unbreakable is active on them, Demented Shaman will receive Unbreakable's effects indefinitely and Unbreakable goes on a 15 second cooldown.

If Unbreakable is ^oDispelled^* without its effects activating, Unbreakable goes on a 30 second cooldown.
column3:
Увеличивает ^oсилу атаки^* цели на ^o{20,40,60} ед.^* и ^oзащищает от смертельного урона^*. При получении смертельного урона, дает вам ^o{200,400,600} ед.^* здоровья, развеивает эффект Unbreakable, а способность начинает восстанавливаться.

Когда способность восстановлена и не на другой цели, ^oэффект Unbreakable остается активным на Demented Shaman^* до получения им смертельного урона.

Активируйте и укажите другого союзного героя, чтобы ^oпередать ему эффект Unbreakable на 15 сек.^* Если цель не получит смертельного урона за время, пока на ней активен эффект Unbreakable, Demented Shaman вернёт себе эффект Unbreakable, а способность Unbreakable восстановится за 15 сек.

Если эффект Unbreakable ^oразвеян^* без активации, способность Unbreakable восстановится за 30 сек.

column2: When taking fatal damage, sets your Health to {200,400,600} and dispels Unbreakable\n\nIf fatal damage is not received, Unbreakable is transferred back to Demented Shaman
column3: При получении смертельного уровня, дает вам {200,400,600} ед. здоровья и развеивает Unbreakable\nЕсли смертельный урон не получен, Unbreakable возвращается к Demented Shaman

column2: No greater shame has the Beast Horde than the Demented Shaman: one of their holiest priests, an initiate into their deepest secrets and greatest lore, who betrayed his people and turned to join the Hellbourne.  He is a force of corruption and outrage, draining the life of the land to heal those who would destroy it and defeat those who would defend it.
column3: Звериная орда не знала большего стыда, чем предательство Demented Shaman: одного из мудрейших жрецов, посвящённого в сокровенные тайны и владеющего величайшими знаниями. Он бросил свой народ и примкнул к Преисподней, осквернив себя гневом и тьмой. Он высасывает жизнь из некогда родной земли, чтобы исцелять её убийц, несущих гибель оставшимся защитникам Новоземья.

column2: The Demented Shaman is able to play an offensive and defensive role simultaneously, as Unbreakable, Healing Wave, and Storm Cloud all have multiple uses. Because Storm Cloud reduces opponent Armor significantly, the Demented Shaman is best paired with a Physical Damage dealer.
column3: Demented Shaman может одновременно использоваться как для нападения, так и для защиты, поскольку способности Unbreakable, Healing Wave, и Storm Cloud имеют вариативность применения. Способность Storm Cloud значительно уменьшает броню противников, и Demented Shaman особенно силен в связке с героем, наносящим физический урон.

column2: Shellshock never travels alone, and can exhume these bioluminescent stowaways from the Luminary to light his path.

Target a location to spawn a line of fireflies which provide ^ovision^* in the area.\n\nEnemy units hit by the blast are dealt ^o{80,120,160,200} Magic Damage^* and a ^o20% Movement Speed Slow^* for 2 seconds.

Fires a blast that travels 1600 units, deals ^o{80,120,160,200} Magic Damage^* and applies a ^o20% Movement Speed Slow^* to enemy units for 2 seconds.\n\nLeaves a trail of Fireflies at random locations along the path which provide ^ovision^* in the area for 15 seconds.
Curling into his shell, Shellshock rolls directly toward his enemy, picking up allies on the way.

Target an enemy unit begin charging up. Allies can enter the shell by ^rright-clicking^* on it. Shellshock launches towards the target after a 3 second delay or upon second activation.

Upon reaching the target, applies a ^o{1,1.25,1.5,1.75} second Stun^* and ^o{60,120,180,240} Magic Damage^* in a small area, plus an additional ^o{20,30,40,50} Magic Damage^* for each ally hero in the shell.

Waiting longer before launching increases speed.

Target an enemy unit prepare to roll and allow allies to enter the shell by right-clicking you. Shellshock launches towards the target after a ^o3 second delay^* or upon second activation.

Waiting longer before launching increases speed. Allies and Shellshock are invulnerable while being transported but can use items and abilities.

Upon reaching the target or after 3 seconds, Shellshock will apply a ^o{1,1.25,1.5,1.75} second Stun^* and ^o{60,120,180,240} Magic Damage^* to all enemy units in a 300 unit radius around himself. An additional ^o{20,30,40,50} Magic Damage^* for each ally hero picked up.

- Minimum speed of 600, maximum of 900.
- Allies can enter the shell throughout the entire effect.

- Minimum speed of 600, maximum of 900.
- Allies can enter the shell throughout the entire effect.

Waiting longer before launching increases speed. Allies and Shellshock are invulnerable while being transported but can use items and abilities.

Upon reaching the target or after 3 seconds, Shellshock will apply a ^o{1,1.25,1.5,1.75} second Stun^* and ^o{60,120,180,240} Magic Damage^* to all enemy units in a 300 unit radius around himself. An additional ^o{20,30,40,50} Magic Damage^* for each ally hero picked up.

- Minimum speed of 600, maximum of 900.
- Allies can enter the shell throughout the entire effect.
They see me rollin', they hatin'
The sacred stone from the Luminary imbues Shellshock with both the protective and destructive forces of Newerth.

Passively grants ^o{1,2,3,4} Magic Armor^* to yourself and nearby ally heroes and ^o{-1,-2,-3,-4} Magic Armor^* to nearby enemy heroes.\n\nOn death, drops a Sanctuary Stone that can be picked up by allies, granting the holder the current power of this ability until Shellshock revives.

Passively applies ^o{1,2,3,4} Magic Armor^* to ally units within 600 radius and ^o{-1,-2,-3,-4} Magic Armor^* to enemy units within 600 radius.

On death, Shellshock drops his Sanctuary stone, which can be picked up by allies to grant them the current power of this ability until Shellshock revives.

The stone will emit the aura even if not picked up but can be destroyed by enemies.

Upon use deals ^o{100,200,300} Magic Damage^* to nearby enemies and applies a ^otapering 80% Move Speed slow^* to them for ^o3 seconds^*.\n\nShellshock then surrounds himself with an electric field that deals ^o{30,40,50} + {1,1.5,2}% of his Max Health in Magic Damage per second^* to nearby enemies for the next ^o10 seconds^*.

Upon use deals ^o{100,200,300} Magic Damage^* to nearby enemies and applies a ^otapering 80% Move Speed slow^* to them for ^o3 seconds^*.\n\nShellshock then surrounds himself with an electric field that deals ^o{30,40,50} + {1,1.5,2}% of his Max Health in Magic Damage per second^* to enemies within 350 range for the next ^o10 seconds^*.
Taking {30,40,50} + {1,1.5,2}% of Shellshock's Max Health in Magic Damage per second

Shellshock is a mobile support hero who thrives on initiating small skirmishes with his teammates. He is able to bring allies with him into battle using Rolling Thunder and makes escaping difficult for his enemies.
Deadly blades orbit Silhouette like lotus petals. She may cause them to splinter outwards, scything through enemy ranks.

Passively creates ^o{1,2,3,4} blades^* that orbit around Silhouette, that deal ^o45 Magic Damage^* to enemy units they pass through.\n\nActivate to shoot the blades outward, dealing ^o{70,140,210,280} Magic Damage^* to enemies they pass through.
Every rose has its thorns. Some Lotuses have them too.

Passively creates {1,2,3,4} blades that orbit around Silhouette, that deal 45 Magic Damage to enemy units they pass through.\n\nActivate to shoot the blades outward, dealing {70,140,210,280} Magic Damage to enemies they pass through.
Silhouette's trusty grappling hook allows her to perform jaw-dropping combat feats, zipping from tree to tree and knocking enemies into stupor with tree trunks.

Target a location to hook and create a chain to the first tree encountered for ^o6 seconds^*.

While Silhouette is chained to a tree, she gains ^o100 Movement Speed^* and Tree Grapple is replaced by two sub-abilities, ^oSky Dance^* and ^oLog Bolas^*.

Sky Dance and Log Bolas deal ^o{80,120,160,200} Magic Damage and a 1 second Stun^*.

Target a location to hook and create a chain to the first tree encountered. The chain lasts for 6 seconds or if it stretches to 1800 units. 

While Silhouette is chained to a tree, she gains 100 Movement Speed and Tree Grapple is replaced by two sub-abilities, Sky Dance and Log Bolas. 

Sky Dance and Log Bolas deal {80,120,160,200} Magic Damage and a 1 second Stun.
Silhouette's favorite dance is that in which she gets to dance on the heads of enemies she flies over.
Activate to launch Silhouette to the tree that she's chained to. She deals ^o{80,120,160,200} Magic Damage^* and a ^o{1} second Stun^* to enemy units she passes through.
Activate to launch Silhouette to the tree that she's chained to. She deals {80,120,160,200} Magic Damage and a {1} second Stun to enemy units she passes through.
Silhouette completely uproots the tree, using the attached tree trunk as a weapon by pulling it to herself.
Activate to destroy the tree Silhouette is chained to and pull it to her. The tree deals ^o{80,120,160,200} Magic Damage^* and a ^o{1} second Stun^* to enemy units it passes through.
Activate to destroy the tree Silhouette is chained to and pull it to her. The tree deals {80,120,160,200} Magic Damage and a {1} second Stun to enemy units it passes through.

Silhouette's attacks pepper the target, adding power with each consecutive attack. She will also take opportunities to throw out a burst of attacks after performing one of her abilities.

Passively causes attacks to apply Relentless Salvo on the target, which lasts 10 seconds and stacks up to 15 times. Attacks deal ^o{4,7,10,13} bonus Physical Damage^* for each stack of Relentless Salvo on the target.\n\nAfter activating a skill, Silhouette gains ^o{400} Attack Speed for 2 attacks or 4 seconds^* if the skill is off cooldown.

Passively causes attacks to apply Relentless Salvo on the target, which lasts 10 seconds and stacks up to 15 times. Attacks deal {4,7,10,13} bonus Physical Damage as a separate damage instance for each stack of Relentless Salvo on the target.

After activating a skill, Silhouette gains {400} Attack Speed for 2 attacks or 4 seconds if the skill is off cooldown.

Illusions can apply Relentless Salvo charges, but do not deal bonus damage.
Silhouette will attack twice in quick succession.
Silhouette will attack twice in quick succession.
Taking {4,7,10,13} bonus Physical Damage per charge from attacks made by Silhouette.
Taking {4,7,10,13} bonus Physical Damage per charge from attacks made by Silhouette.
Silhouette creates an illusion of herself that exactly replicates her.  She may swap places with her illusion to even further throw her enemies off!

Activate to disjoint, dispel all Buffs & Debuffs on self, and create a Shadow. The Shadow is an illusion that lasts for ^o{20,30,40} seconds^* and takes ^o{200,150,100}% of normal damage^* and deals ^o100% of normal damage^*. \n\nCreates a sub-ability which allows Silhouette to swap locations with the Shadow.
This is my Shadow. There are many like it, but this one is mine.

Activate to disjoint, dispel all Buffs & Debuffs on self, and create a Shadow. The Shadow is an illusion that lasts for {20,30,40} seconds and takes {200,150,100}% of normal damage and deals 100% of normal damage. \n\nCreates a sub-ability which allows Silhouette to swap locations with the Shadow.
Instantly swaps the locations of Silhouette and her Shadow.
Like a Ninja, poofing for the very first time.
Instantly swaps the locations of Silhouette and her Shadow.

An orphaned child, Silhouette trained in the Hidden Village of the Scout, working hard towards her goal to become the greatest assassin in Newerth. Unlike her fellow scouts, she was loud, boisterous, and most of all, simply not stealthy. Yet what she lacked in subtlety was made up for with heart, attitude, and the ability to conjure a perfect mirror image of herself. Believe it!

Silhouette is a skill-shot based carry that is highly dependent on player finesse and control. Nevertheless, she is especially deadly to enemy melee and support, who she can pick off quickly with the burst damage from Relentless Salvo. Her hallmark ability Shadow allows her to create a nearly indistinguishable image of herself.

Target a direction to dash forward, passing through the first enemy hero hit and stopping.\n\nEnemies hit receive ^o{100,170,240,310} Magic Damage^* and a ^o{1.25,1.5,1.75,2} second Stun^*.

After a 0.6 second startup, charges up to 1000 units forward, passing through the first enemy hero hit and stopping 175 units on the other side of it.\n\nDeals ^o{100,170,240,310} Magic Damage^* to all enemies you pass through and ^oStuns^* them for ^o{1.25,1.5,1.75,2} seconds^*.
I challenge you to a duel, now stand there while I charge.

Every Lancer knows how to jump, not every Lancer can jump across Newerth and still hit their target.

Target a location to leap into the air after a ^o2 second channel^* and land there after a second delay.\n\nWhen Benzington lands, he deals ^o{200,350,500} Magic Damage^* and applies a ^o50% tapering Movement Speed slow^* for 2 seconds in a ^o{400,500,600} radius^*.

Leaps into the air after a ^o2 second channel^*, becoming invulnerable for 1 second.

A visual growing shadow will appear at the target location. Sir Benzington will land on that spot 1 second after the channel ends, dealing ^o{200,350,500} Magic Damage^* in a ^o{400,500,600} radius^* and apply ^oKnightfall^* to enemies for 2 seconds.

50% Movement Speed Slow initially, tapering over duration

The beavrels are a proud species, fiercely protective of their territory. Dangerous enough with tooth and tail, they have adapted to the daemon threat by forming the Lancer Brotherhood, led by the fearless Sir Benzington upon his loyal fearet Balric. His righteous lance was crafted for one purpose: piercing the very heart of the Hellbourne.

Nimble and deadly, Benzington is a highly mobile melee ganking hero that also gains increased attack range. Knightfall and Joust allows for engagements at incredible distances making Benzington an intimidating force anytime an enemy is spotted.

Target an area to throw a Mousetrap there that lasts up to 40 seconds, dealing ^o{60,80,100,120} Magic Damage^* and applying a ^oMini-Stun^*.\n\nAfter arming, the Mousetrap will chase the first enemy that comes within range and explodes, dealing ^o{80,100,120,140} Magic Damage^* and applying a ^o{1.25,1.5,1.75,2} second Stun^* to nearby enemies.
Fusing utility and mobility, Skrap ties a makeshift bomb to a lesser rodent.

Tosses a Mousetrap at the targeted location, which lands after 0.8 seconds. Mousetrap deals ^o{60,80,100,120} Magic Damage^* to all enemies in a 250 radius and ^oMini-Stuns them for 0.1 seconds^*.

After a 1 second delay, the Mousetrap will activate, chasing the first visible enemy that comes within 250 units, prioritizing heroes.

After 1.5 seconds of chasing, or if the Mousetrap comes within 60 units of the target being chased, the Mousetrap will explode, dealing ^o{80,100,120,140} Magic Damage^* to all enemies in a 250 radius and ^oStunning them for {1.25,1.5,1.75,2} seconds.^*

Mousetraps move at 350 Movement Speed and give 300 day and night vision. Each Mousetrap lasts 40 seconds, exploding prematurely if no enemy comes within range during its lifetime. Blocks neutral camps.
Here's Jerry. We wait for Tom!

Target a location to throw a Zoomerang in that direction. Deals ^o{60,80,100,120} Magic Damage^* and applies a ^ostacking 20% Movement Speed Slow^* to enemy units. Zoomerang can hit again on the way back.\n\nCooldown reduced by ^o{8} seconds^* if caught, or ^o{4} seconds^* if picked up from ground. Zoomerang collects Morsels while flying.
Skrap's Zoomerang serves many purposes, but he can always trust it to come right back. Well, most of the time.

Throws a Zoomerang in the targeted direction, which travels 1000 units. Enemies hit receive ^o{60,80,100,120} Magic Damage^* and a ^o20% Movement Speed Slow^*.

After traveling 1000 units, the Zoomerang will return to the location Skrap is standing in, dealing another ^o{60,80,100,120} Magic Damage^* and applying an ^oadditional 20% Movement Speed Slow^* to enemies that it hits.

If Skrap catches the Zoomerang on its return flight, the ^ocooldown of the ability is reduced by 8 seconds^*. If he misses, the Zoomerang will fly 800 units behind Skrap's current location and land. Skrap may pick up the Zoomerang from the ground, ^oreducing the cooldown of the ability by 4 seconds^*.

Zoomerang collects Morsels while flying and brings them to wherever it lands.

Toggle on to consume 1 Morsel per second.

Heals self and ally heroes in range for ^o10 Health^* per Morsel.
Heals Vorax for ^o{15,35,55,75} Health^* per Morsel.

Passively allows Skrap to pick up Morsels from dead units, granting ^o8 experience^* each. Dying will reduce collected Morsels by 30%.

Max 100 Morsels.
As delicious Morsels litter the battlefield, Skrap can't help but to gather them, adding to his fetid collection.

When toggled on, consumes 1 collected Morsel per second. Each Morsel heals ally heroes in a 800 radius, including Skrap, for ^o10 Health^*.

If Vorax is within 800 units, he will be healed for ^o{15,35,55,75} Health per Morsel^*.

Red Morsels grant 8 experience each. Heroes and structures, including Skrap, yield 4 Morsels each on death; any other non-gadget unit has a 50% chance to drop 1 Morsel on death. Each time a Morsel drops, it has a 10% chance to spawn as a special Purple Morsel, granting 5 times the amount of Morsels and experience if picked up.
Now I'm not saying I'm a grave digger...

Choose a lane to spawn Vorax, an uncontrollable monster with ^o{2000,3500,5000} Health^* and ^o{100,120,140} Attack Damage^*, in that lane.

Vorax will push the lane, ^oDisarming enemy towers^* on attack, but hurting itself.

Vorax is visible to enemies at all times.
Did you hear that terrifying howl? It sounded like Vorax, the monster that Skrap has trained to do his bidding.

Summons Vorax in a selected lane. Vorax spawns with ^o{100,120,140} Attack Damage^*, ^o{2000,3500,5000} Health^*, ^o10 Armor^*, and ^o10 Magic Armor^* at the lane's creep spawn location, moving at the same speed as his lane creeps down the lane. Vorax appears on the mini-map to both teams, and provides 200 day and night vision to both allies and enemies.

Vorax will attack any enemy that comes within 150 units, but will otherwise disregard attacks against him. Every 10 seconds, Vorax uses Rock Smash to throw a boulder at the furthest enemy hero, dealing Vorax's current attack damage and applying a ^otapering 75% Movement Speed Slow^* for 2 seconds. If within 600 units of a structure, Vorax will focus his attention solely on that structure, ^oDisarming it^* and dealing ^oTrue Damage to himself^* on each attack. Vorax kills creeps in one hit.

If not killed within 3 minutes, Vorax will retreat from the battlefield. Vorax gives {100,150,200} gold and {100,150,200} experience when slain, but none if he kills himself. More than one Vorax cannot be active at the same time per Skrap.
Target an enemy hero to launch a projectile at them, dealing Vorax's ^ocurrent Attack Damage^* and applying a ^o75% tapering Movement Speed Slow^*.
Vorax grabs a large rock from the ground and throws it at a nearby hero.

Target an enemy unit to launch a projectile at them, dealing Vorax's ^ocurrent Attack Damage^* and applying a ^o75% tapering Movement Speed Slow^*.\n\nThis ability will activate automatically if no target is selected.

Skrap is a support hero who is capable of pushing lanes with the help of his monster, Vorax. His long-range abilities help him stay behind the front line while harassing enemy heroes and destroying their towers.

Skrap is a cunning scavenger from the Seradati Plains who once roamed the desolate landscape gathering carrion to feed himself and occasionally sell in the rare event he encountered another living thing. Now he hoards every daemon carcass he can find to nourish his destructive, ravenous pet Vorax in the war against the Hellbourne. Skrap prefers to skulk along the edges of combat, harassing the enemy and harvesting their remains until he has enough to feed the Vorax, who revels in charging forward and demolishing everything in its path.

Among the tribes of the moon, there lives an elite caste of warriors. Like Krixi, the Moon Queen, these women draw their power from the rays of Lunari. As children of the Moon Goddess, the rays of Sol burn their flesh, forcing them to construct a vessel to channel Lunari's might during the day. The magicks used were so potent that only a chosen warrior, born in perfect balance between light and darkness, could harness its vast power by being forever bonded to her armor. In the night, the chosen can retake her true form and strike from the shadows, free from her confining shell. Be it through strength by day or stealth by night, Solstice, the Lady of Lunari, stands ready to show her enemies what power truly is.

Solstice changes her role from a more tanky, team-fight presence during the day, to an agile ganker during the night. Look for ways to set up your ultimate from outside of enemy's vision range in order to deal the maximum damage!
Soulstealer calls upon the greater Hellbourne daemons to lay waste to the enemies before him.
Activate to deal ^o{100,175,250,325} Magic Damage^* to each target in an area in front of you.
Deals {100,175,250,325} Magic Damage to each target in radius.
Demon Hand attacks enemies at a short distance in front of Soulstealer.
Activate to deal ^o{100,175,250,325} Magic Damage^* to each target in an area 200 units in front of you.
Deals {100,175,250,325} Magic Damage to each target in radius 200 units in front of self.
Demon Hand attacks enemies at a medium distance in front of Soulstealer.

Deals {100,175,250,325} Magic Damage to each target in radius 450 units in front of self.
Demon Hand attacks enemies at a long distance in front of Soulstealer.
Activate to deal ^o{100,175,250,325} Magic Damage^* to each target in an area 700 units in front of you.
Deals {100,175,250,325} Magic Damage to each target in radius 700 units in front of self.
Soulstealer steals the souls of all he vanquishes, increasing his damage as his collection grows.

Passively grants you a Soul when you kill a unit, up to a maximum of ^o{10,20,30,40} Souls^*. Each Soul adds ^o2 Attack Damage^*. Hero kills grant 5 charges to Soulsteal.\n\nDying will cause you to lose 1/3 of your Souls.

What's the matter, are you scared?

Soulstealer releases torrents of negative energy whose strength is based on the number of souls he has collected. Torrent damages nearby enemies. The closer an enemy is, the more damage the torrent will do.

Activate to cast for 1.4 seconds and then deal up to ^o{150,225,300} + {15,22.5,30} Magic Damage per Soul^* you possess to enemies within 100 range. Damage greatly decreases the farther away enemies are.\n\nApplies ^o{-25}% Movement Speed and Base Damage^* to all enemies hit for 5 seconds.

The priests tell young men bound for the battlefield that if they fall, Elysian fields and peace awaits them. But this is not strictly true, not as long as the Soulstealer walks the battlefield. Gathering the spirits of those he kills in a bloody, shadowy sack, he augments his own power with their suffering.  Those who see him quake in terror to know that death, for them, will be no release, but only a fiery captivity and oblivion.

Soulstealer is one of the most rounded heroes in the game, featuring mana-efficient but damaging magical spells but also high Physical Damage. Soulstealer's only weaknesses are a lack of survivability and mobility, but these can be remedied by amassing wealth.
Succubus causes a target enemy to be smitten with her beauty. Drastically reduces all damage done by the target.
Target an enemy unit to reduce all of its damage output by ^o{26,34,42,50}%^* for {10,12,14,16} seconds.
Applies Smitten to target for {10,12,14,16} seconds. Reduces the damage output of the target by {26,34,42,50}%.
Beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
Succubus breaks the heart of a foe, and feeds off the despair it causes, simultaneously damaging the enemy and healing herself.
Target an enemy unit to deal ^o{90,160,230,300} True Damage^* and heal yourself for the same amount.
Don't die of a broken heart!
Deals {90,160,230,300} True damage to target unit, and heals self for {90,160,230,300}.

Direct damage will remove the Sleep and if attacked, the Sleep is transferred to the attacker.\n\nThe target is invulnerable for the first second of the Sleep state. Succubus can dispel Mesmerize on herself at any time.

Applies Mesmerize to target for {4,5,6,7} seconds. The target is invulnerable for the first second of becoming Mesmerized. If any unit attacks the Mesmerized target, the effects are passed to them.\n\nSuccubus can dispel Mesmerize on herself at any time.
20 True damage every second\nWhen attacked, Mesmerize is removed and transferred to attacker.

Many a soldier of the Legion has disappeared on solitary watches when the Succubus is at large, lured in by her seductive calls.  Swollen with stolen life, this daemon offers no true pleasure to those who succumb to her advances, but all the same her name carries a certain terrible allure.

Succubus has an array of disables and debuffs that allows her to simultaneously devalue multiple opponents in battle. In a lane, her Heartache deals extremely high damage and heals her at the same time.
Throw a corpse at your enemies!

Target an enemy to throw a corpse at him.  ^oDeals {60,100,100,140} Magic Damage^* and applies a ^o1 second Stun^*.

May be cast ^c{1,1,2,2}^* times in succession.  Charges refresh every ^c7 seconds^*.

Leaves a corpse at target's feet.

Deals an initial 60 Magic Damage to enemies in radius and detonates corpses in target area, deals {20,40,60,80} Magic Damage in a 300 radius around each corpse detonated.\n\nMaximum of 6 corpses may be detonated at once.

column2: Walking over a corpse picks it up and allows you to throw it as your next attack.  This attack deals a bonus ^o{15,30,45,60} Physical Damage and slows the target by {25,30,35,40}% for 2 seconds^*.\n\nAttack leaves 1 corpse at target's feet.

column2: Activate to enable tossing the corpse only against enemy heroes.\n\nWalk over a corpse to pick it up. Your next attack tosses the corpse, dealing {15,30,45,60} bonus Physical Damage and applying a {25,30,35,40}% Movement Speed Slow for 2 seconds. Leave a corpse at target's position.

Следующая атака позволит бросить поднятый труп, дополнительно нанося {15,30,45,60} ед. физического урона и уменьшая скорость передвижения цели на {25,30,35,40}% на 2 сек. column3: Активируйте, чтобы бросать трупы во всех вражеских воинов.\n\nПройдите по трупу, чтобы поднять его. Следующая атака позволит бросить поднятый труп, дополнительно нанося {15,30,45,60} ед. физического урона и уменьшая скорость передвижения цели на {25,30,35,40}% на 2 сек. Труп остаётся лежать у ног цели.

column3: Вызывает нашествие ходячих мертвецов в указанной области!

column2: Target an area to summon ^o{10,16,24} Zombies^* at the location - an Unstable Zombie or Wretched Zombie will be spawned.  ^oUnstable Zombies explode, dealing {55,70,85} Magic Damage. Wretched Zombies attack for {30,35,40} Physical Damage per attack^* (Attacks ignore deflection).\n\nZombies are uncontrollable and last for 8 seconds, 5 seconds if they are exploding.  Zombies have {350,500,650} Health.
column3: Укажите область, чтобы призвать ^o{10,16,24} зомби^* двух типов: Unstable Zombie и Wretched Zombie. ^oUnstable Zombie взрываются, нанося {55,70,85} ед. магического урона. Wretched Zombie атакуют и наносят {30,35,40} ед. физического урона за удар^* (игнорируя блокирование).\n\nUnstable Zombie и Wretched Zombi неконтролируемы, имеют {350,500,650} ед. здоровья и существуют 5 сек. и 8 сек. соответственно.

column2:
Summons ^o{10,16,24} uncontrollable Zombies^* at target location - an Unstable Zombie or Wretched Zombie will be spawned. Unstable Zombies explode and ^odeal {55,70,85} Magic Damage^* in a 200 radius, and Wretched Zombies ^odeal {30,35,40} Physical Damage^* on attack (ignores Deflection) with an attack cooldown of 1.25 seconds.

Wretched Zombies last 8 seconds, and Unstable Zombies last 5 seconds. Both Zombies have 400 Movement Speed, {350,500,650} Health, and 5.5 Armor.

- Enemies chased by zombies will be sighted.
column3:
Призывает в указанное место ^o{10,16,24} неконтролируемых зомби^* двух типов: Unstable Zombie и Wretched Zombie. Unstable Zombie взрываются, ^oнанося {55,70,85} ед. магического урона^* в радиусе 200 ед. Wretched Zombie атакуют каждые 1.25 сек., ^oнанося по {30,35,40} ед. физического урона^* за удар (игнорируя блокирование).

Unstable Zombie и Wretched Zombie имеют 400 ед. скорости передвижения, 5.5 ед. брони, {350,500,650} ед. здоровья и существуют 5 сек, и 8 сек. соответственно.

- Враги, преследуемые зомби будут видимы.

column2: On the battlefields of Newerth, rich in the tainted blood of man, beast, and demon, an ancient evil grows. Consuming the flesh from the fallen he claws his way to the surface, his once dead eyes alive again with hunger and eager to consume the dead. Especially those created by his own undead hands...
column3: На полях сражений Новоземья, залитых кровью людей, зверей и демонов, появилось древнее зло. Оно выбралось из старых могил, чтобы вновь увидеть сгнившими глазами белый свет и обглодать кости погибших. Это зло всегда голодно, готово пожирать мёртвых и создавать их своими собственными ледяными руками...

column2: Gravekeeper may be played as a semi-carry or support ganker.  His potential in a battle increases drastically as corpses pile up and he may use them at his disposal.  Look to get a max damage Corpse Explosion after using Zombie Apocalypse!
column3: Gravekeeper может быть как полу-кэрри, так выполнять роль ганкера-героя поддержки. Герой может использовать трупы, и боевая мощь Gravekeeper сильно зависит от наличия оных на поле битвы. Так, сочетание способностей Zombie Apocalypse и Corpse Explosion может внести колоссальное количество урона.

column2: Tarot bounces a special shielded explosive projectile off her target, dealing damage to nearby enemies as the projectile bounces around.

The bolt will ^obounce up to 8 times^* to nearby enemies, prioritizing targets affected by Bound by Fate.

Non-hero units take ^o2x the Physical Damage^* per bounce.

The bolt will ^obounce up to 8 times^* to nearby enemies, prioritizing targets affected by Bound by Fate.

Non-hero units take ^o2x the Physical Damage^* per bounce.

Now I know how a goldfish feels.
Attacks bounce to closest enemy hero
Tarot can bind two enemies together, making it hard for them to get away from each other. If they break the bind, though, they take a serious penalty.

Target an enemy unit to apply a ^o30% Movement Speed Slow^* and ^oBind it to another nearby enemy^* for 5 seconds.\n\nIf the two Bound units move further than 675 units apart, or one of them dies, the Bind snaps and ^opulls them together^*, applying a ^o2.25 second Stun^* and dealing ^o{75,150,225,300} Magic Damage^*.

Target an enemy unit to apply a ^o30% Movement Speed Slow^* and ^oBind it to another nearby enemy^* for 5 seconds.\n\nIf the two Bound units move further than 675 units apart, or one of them dies, the Bind snaps and ^opulls them together^*, applying a ^o2.25 second Stun^* and dealing ^o{75,150,225,300} Magic Damage^*.

Slowly pulled towards the other Bound unit (if it is alive).\n\nIf the two Bound units move further than 675 units apart, or one dies, the Bind snaps and pulls them together, applying a 2.25 second Stun and dealing {75,150,225,300} Magic Damage.
Tarot is accurate with her shots, often hitting critical weak points.
Passively grants a ^o20% chance^* to perform a ^o{2,3.5,5}x Critical Hit^* on attack.
Passively grants a ^o20% chance^* to perform a ^o{2,3.5,5}x Critical Hit^* on attack.

For centuries, the Ageless Oracle has been reborn at the peak of conflict to serve as the voice of the gods and share her visions with the mortals, but to never interfere.

Reborn after the Beast Bone Years as Tarot, a fortune teller who travels with her caravan of gypsies through the ravaged Forests of Caldavar, she foresaw the downfall of Maliken Grimm and the opening of The Scar but was powerless to stop it.

Now Tarot has visions of the destruction of the World Tree, and with full awareness of the doomed future of Newerth she cannot continue with mere divination. She must join the fight against the Hellbourne and tip fate, wavering on the precarious tip of destruction, toward life.

Tarot is an incredibly hard carry that scales into the late game better than almost anyone else. Luck of the Draw is her crowning jewel, allowing her to hit tremendously hard as the game goes on. Her other abilities give her control of a fight while giving her an advantage when solo against 2 opponents.
Tempest blasts a target enemy with icy winds, chilling it every two seconds. Being chilled causes the target to take damage and be Stunned briefly.

Target an enemy unit to instantly blast it with ice.

On each impact, deals ^o50 Magic Damage^* to target and applies a ^o1 second Stun^*. Impacts a maximum of {1,2,3,4} time(s). Each impact occurs in 2 second intervals.

Impacts will not occur if you do not have vision of your target.

On each impact, deals 50 Magic Damage to target and Stuns for 1 second. Impacts a maximum of {1,2,3,4} times. Impacts occur in 2 second intervals.\n\nImpacts will not occur if you do not have vision of your target.
Receives a 1 second Stun every 2 seconds.
Tempest sacrifices a target unit and extracts from it the very elements that composed its being. With these elements, Tempest creates three elementals under his control.

Target a creep unit to kill it and spawn three Elementals that last for 35 seconds. After an Elemental attacks 6 times, it will split into two elementals. The Elementals have a ranged attack of ^o{18,24,30,36} Physical Damage^* and ^o{200,225,225,275} Health^*.\n\nLevel 1 of this ability cannot target allied units.

Kills target unit and spawns three Elementals. Elementals have a life time of 35 seconds, {200,225,225,275} Health, {2,3,4,5} Armor, 17 Magic Armor, and deal {18,24,30,36} Physical Damage with each attack. After 6 attacks, Elementals replicate themselves, spawning a new Elemental with the same remaining life time.\n\nLevel 1 of this ability cannot target allied units.
Each attack on a non-building enemy unit adds a charge to the skill. Upon reaching 6 charges, the Elemental will duplicate into 2 Elementals at full HP with the remaining lifetime.
Each attack on a non-building enemy unit adds a charge to the skill. Upon reaching 6 charges, the Elemental will duplicate into 2 Elementals at full HP with the remaining lifetime.
Attuned to all things natural and cosmic, Tempest calls down a meteor that destroys trees & ignites a target area, causing units within to take damage over time.
Target a location to summon a meteor that deals ^o{2,3,4,5}% of an enemy's maximum Health in Magic Damage per second^* if they stand in it. Lasts 8 seconds.
Damages targets in radius by {2,3,4,5}% of their maximum Health in Magic Damage per second. Lasts 8 seconds.
{2,3,4,5}% of max Health in Magic Damage per second

Tempest uses his power over the elements to create an extremely low pressure system at target location, causing fierce winds to drag all enemy units toward that target location, disabling affected units and dealing Magic Damage over time.

^gThis ability can be boosted by Staff of the Master.^*\n\n^gStaff Effect:^* Your abilities and Elementals now deal True Damage. Meteor can now be cast while channeling. Decreases cooldown to 120 seconds.

Target a location to channel an Elemental Void in the area for up to 4 seconds. Enemies who are in the Void are unable to attack, cannot use spells or items, are pulled towards the center, and take up to ^o{200,300,400} Magic Damage^*.\n\n^gStaff Effect:^* Your abilities and Elementals now deal True Damage. Decreases cooldown to 120 seconds.
Applies Elemental Void to targets in 400 radius and pulls them toward center of radius. Provides Clearvision and Reveals stealthed and invisible units, including Wards, in a 400 radius while active.
Listening to the wind of change.
^gThis ability has been boosted by Staff of the Master.^*

Target a location to channel an Elemental Void in the area for up to 4 seconds. Enemies who are in the Void are unable to attack, cannot use spells or items, are pulled towards the center, and take up to ^o{200,300,400} Magic Damage^*.\n\n^gYour abilities and Elementals now deal True Damage. Meteor can now be cast while channeling.^* This ability has been boosted by Staff of the Master.

Applies Elemental Void to targets in 400 radius and pulls them toward center of radius. Provides Clearvision and Reveals stealthed and invisible units, including Wards, in a 400 radius while active.\n\n^gYour abilities and Elementals now deal True Damage. Meteor can now be cast while channeling.^*

Spirits born of the elements, Tempests howl across the land raining fire and ice alike, indeed even calling great meteors from the heavens.  Summoned of old by the Beast Horde, these ethereal beings now are summoners themselves, bringing elementals and even shadows of themselves onto the battlefield.  Even their allies view these strange beings with awe bordering on fear.

Tempest is most often sent to farm neutrals with Elementals from the onset of the game, with the sole expectation that he will emerge with a Portal Key with which he can cast Elemental Void with high precision.
The Keeper uses his influence over the forest to hide and buff his allies. Grants 0.25 second fade time Invisibility, Armor, and Regeneration to target unit.
column3: Keeper использует власть над лесом, чтобы спрятать и защитить своих союзников. Способность даёт указанному воину броню, регенерацию здоровья и невидимость с временем исчезновения в 1 сек.

column2: Target an allied unit to apply ^o{1,2,3,4} Health Regeneration^*, ^o{2,3,4,5} Armor^*, and ^o1 second fade time Invisibility^* for ^o{15,30,45,60} seconds.^* Invisibility only lasts as long as they are near a tree.
column3: Укажите союзного воина, чтобы дать ему ^o{1,2,3,4} ед. регенерации здоровья^*, ^o{2,3,4,5} брони^* и ^oневидимость с временем исчезновения в 1 сек.^* на ^o{15,30,45,60} сек.^* Невидимость длится до тех пор, пока цель находится рядом с деревом.

column2: Target an allied unit to apply ^o{1,2,3,4} Health Regeneration^*, ^o{2,3,4,5} Armor^*, and ^o1 second fade time Invisibility^* for ^o{15,30,45,60} seconds.^* Invisibility only lasts as long as they are near a tree.\n\n-Invis lasts as long as a tree is within 400 units.
column3: Укажите союзного воина, чтобы дать ему ^o{1,2,3,4} ед. регенерации здоровья^*, ^o{2,3,4,5} брони^* и ^oневидимость с временем исчезновения в 1 сек.^* на ^o{15,30,45,60} сек.^* Невидимость длится до тех пор, пока цель находится рядом с деревом.\n\n-Невидимость пропадёт, если цель отдалится от деревьев дальше чем на 400 ед.

column2: Dispelled if unit is not within 400 units from a tree
column3: Пропадёт, если цель отдалится от деревьев дальше чем на 400 ед.

column2: The Keeper links his mind with nearby trees, bringing them to life.
column3: Keeper связывает свой разум с ближайшими деревьями, оживляя их.

column2: Target a tree to Animate ^o{1,2,3,4} nearby trees^*. Trees last for ^o40 seconds^*, have 600 health and 300 Movement Speed.\n\nAnimated Trees are considered trees for all of your abilities.
column3: Укажите дерево, чтобы оживить ^o{1,2,3,4} ближайших деревьев^*. Деревья существуют ^o40 сек^*, имеют 600 ед. здоровья и передвигаются со скоростью 300 ед.\n\nОжившие деревья считаются деревьями для всех ваших способностей.

column2:
Target a tree to Animate ^o{1,2,3,4} nearby trees^*. Trees last for ^o40 seconds^*, have 600 health and 300 Movement Speed.

Animated Trees are considered trees for all of your abilities.

Ожившие деревья считаются деревьями для всех ваших способностей.

-Ожившие деревья наносят 25 ед. урона.

column2: The Keeper gains power from the forest around him, enhancing his Attack Damage when near his animated trees.
column3: Keeper получает силу от окружающего его леса. Когда он находится рядом с ожившими деревьями, его атаки усиливаются.

column2: Passively gains ^o{4,8,12,16} Attack Speed^* per Animated Tree within a 900 radius (up to 5).\n\nYour attacks have a 20% chance, or 100% versus stationary heroes, to ^ospawn an Animated Tree^* for 20 seconds with 300 Health. Illusions have 33% of the original proc chance to spawn an Animated Tree.
column3: Пассивно даёт ^o{4,8,12,16} ед. скорости атаки^* за каждое ожившее дерево (не более 5), находящееся в радиусе 900 ед.\n\nПри каждой атаке вашего героя с вероятностью 20% или, если атакуемая цель - стоящий герой, с вероятностью 100% будут ^oпоявляться ожившие деревья^* на 20 сек, обладающие 300 ед. здоровья. Иллюзии создают ожившие деревья с вероятностью, которая составляет 33% от указанной вероятности.

column2:
Passively gains ^o{4,8,12,16} Attack Speed^* per Animated Tree within a 900 radius (up to 5).

Your attacks have a 20% chance, or 100% versus stationary heroes, to ^ospawn an Animated Tree^* for 20 seconds with 300 Health.

Animated Trees deal 25 damage and 300 Movespeed. Illusions have 33% of the original proc chance to spawn an Animated Tree.

При каждой атаке вашего героя с вероятностью 20% или, если атакуемая цель - стоящий герой, с вероятностью 100% будут ^oпоявляться ожившие деревья^* на 20 сек, обладающие 300 ед. здоровья.

Ожившее дерево наносит 25 ед. урона и передвигается со скоростью 300 ед. Иллюзии создают ожившие деревья с вероятностью, которая составляет 33% от указанной вероятности.

column2: The Keeper calls upon the roots in the ground to Disarm and immobilize his foes, as well as damage them over time.
column3: Keeper приказывает корням в земле разоружить и обездвижить своих врагов, а также постепенно наносить урон.

column2:

^oEffect also emanates from all of your active Animated Trees.^*

^oЭффект также исходит от всех ваших оживших деревьев.^*

column2: An ancient protector of the forest, the Keeper fights to save the lush lands of Newerth he has tended to his whole long life. Possessing a spiritual link to the trees, the Keeper has the ability to see what they see, be hidden amongst them, and even use them as brutal weapons to aid him in battle.
column3: Древний защитник леса, Keeper сражается за спасение процветающих земель Новоземья, к которым он тяготел всю свою долгую жизнь. Духовно связанный с деревьями, он видит всё, что видят они, может скрываться среди них и даже использовать их живую силу в бою.

column2: A literal tree trunk's worth of strength and armor, the Keeper of the Forest has but one massive offensive ability in Root. Nevertheless, his Nature's Protection, coupled with his naturally high strength gain, allows him to farm with abandon.
column3: Keeper of the Forest обладает одной из самых мощных наступательных способностей - Root. Nature's Protection, в сочетании с его природной силой, позволяют ему бесконтрольно добывать золото.

column2: Tremble summons a massive swarm of bugs from beneath the earth to act as his personal shield, deflecting ranged attackers and suffocating nearby enemies.

Boris is covered in slabs of organic carapace.

Hellbourne corruption has spread across Newerth--and deep into it as well. From beneath the crusted depths emerges the carapaced undying horror that is Tremble, awakened to wreak havoc upon the Legion forces. Mysterious terrain deformations seem to herald his arrival, while a trail of corpses marks his path of departure.

Tremble is a highly mobile ganker and pusher capable of hiding invisible under Terror Mounds, slowing unsuspecting enemies to a crawl with Impalers. He may summon Shudder, a pet that can operate independently and can access many of the same abilities Tremble can.
Tundra can control ice and form it into deadly spikes at a whim, letting him unleash two waves of them towards his enemies. The Shards will curve towards any target, destroying trees in their path.
Target a location to throw two curving projectiles that deal ^o{180,250,320,390} Superior Mixed Damage^* each. Destroys trees.

Anything hit by the ice shards takes up to ^o{180,250,320,390} Superior Mixed Damage^*. This damage is reduced by both Magic and Physical Armor. Each shard can damage an enemy once.\n\nThis ability destroys trees. Also grants 500 day and night Clearvision while active.

Tundra has lived alone so long that he has formed bonds with the birds and wildlife of the mountains. His two favorites are Shiver and Coeurl. When he calls, they will come to his aid in battle for a short time.

On activation, summons Shiver the flying scout and Coeurl the ranged attacker. Coeurl is only summoned at level 2 and above.

Shiver provides ^o{900,1000,1100,1200} range Clearvision, sees enemy Veiled Rot stealth within this range,^* and moves at ^o{270,270,400,400} Movement Speed^*.

Coeurl's autoattacks inflict a ^o{0,20,30,40} Attack Speed Slow and a {0,20,30,40}% Movement Speed Slow^*.
Both Shiver and Coeurl can be ordered to patrol to a destination or to follow an ally.
Shiver and Coeurl, I choose you!

Summons Shiver and Coeurl for 60 seconds.

^yShiver^*:
- {100,100,200,200} Health
- {270,270,400,400} Movement Speed.
- Splash Immune
- {900,1000,1100,1200} range Clearvision, sees enemy Veiled Rot stealth and dispels it after 2 seconds
- Gains the ability to go invisible for a short time at level 3

^yCoeurl^*:
- {0,400,450,500} Health
- {0,26,36,46} Attack Damage
- 350 Movement Speed
- On attack, slows Movement Speed of target by {0,20,30,40}% and Attack Speed by {0,20,30,40}
Shiver can use winds in the sky to shield herself from view for a very brief time.
Applies Winter's Guise to self for 6 seconds

Coeurl is not only the eldest of his pride, but also the only one to master the ice's freezing bite. He learned to throw ice at his enemies instead of bite and claw them, slowing them for a short time on each hit.
On attack, passively inflicts ^o{0,-20,-30,-40}% Movement Speed and -{0,20,30,40} Attack Speed^*.
Patrols between the current and target location.
On use issues an order to ^oPatrol^* between the current and target position, attacking any enemies encountered.

On use issues an order to ^oPatrol^* between the current and target position, going back and forth and attacking any enemies encountered.\n\nCan be used on an allied unit to follow that unit around and attack its enemies when it is engaging in combat.
Patrols between the current and target location.
On use issues an order to ^oPatrol^* between the current and target position.
On use issues an order to ^oPatrol^* between the current and target position, going back and forth.\n\nCan be used on an allied unit to follow that unit around.

Last winter, Tundra had two distant relatives teach him how to charge his enemies correctly, coating them in ice on contact. The ice makes them easier to hit, increasing everyone's Attack Speed against that target.

Target an enemy unit to charge to it, dealing your ^oAttack Damage^* on impact and applies a ^otapering 60% Movement Speed Slow^* to the target for 2 seconds. For the next 8 seconds, any ally that attacks the target will be granted ^o{20,40,60,80} Attack Speed^*.
The Brothers of cold send their regards...
On use, charges the target, dealing Tundra's Attack Damage on impact and applies a ^otapering 60% Movement Speed Slow^* to the target for 2 seconds.\n\nApplies Cold Shoulder to them for 8 seconds.
Increases Attack Speed against this target by {20,40,60,80}\nWhen attacked, applies (and refreshes) Cold Shouldered! to attacker for 2 seconds.
Tundra can control the mountain itself when in a fit of rage, summoning a piece of a glacier to smash his target and toss any nearby enemy heroes away.

Target an enemy unit to deal ^o{200,250,300} Magic Damage^* and a ^o{3,3.5,4} second Stun^*. Enemy units between you and your target take ^o{100,200,300} Magic Damage^*, ^o-50% Movement Speed and Attack Speed for {2,3,4} seconds^*, and are pushed to the side.
I've frozen Mammoths in these things.

Deals {200,250,300} Magic Damage and Stuns target for {3,3.5,4} seconds.\n\nPushes anyone between Tundra and his target 240 units away, deals {100,200,300} Magic Damage, and applies Avalanche to them for {2,3,4} seconds.

From the ice-caverns of the Frostfield hails Tundra, a white ape shaman of enormous size and power. His thundering voice commands the obedience of wild creatures and his magical powers conjure up the terrible cold of his northern home. Even fiery Hellbourne daemons feel a chill as he enters the fray.

Tundra is most commonly played as a ganker, using Call of Winter to scout for victims. Both Piercing Shards and Avalanche will affect opponents through immunity, making Tundra extremely effective at all levels against opposing damage dealers.
Valkyrie calls forth several Battle Maidens to damage nearby enemies.
Activate to deal ^o{75,150,225,300} Magic Damage^* in an area around self.\n\nDeals an additional ^o{37.5,75,112.5,150} Magic Damage^* to the closest target next to you.
Deals ^o{75,150,225,300} Magic Damage^* to targets in radius around self.\n\nDeals an additional ^o{37.5,75,112.5,150} Magic Damage^* to the closest target in a 200 radius.
Valkyrie hurls a Javelin of Light toward a target location. The first enemy hit will be damaged and Stunned. Stun duration depends on the distance the Javelin has traveled.

Target a location to throw a Javelin in that direction.

The first enemy hit by the Javelin is dealt ^o{90,180,270,360} Magic Damage^* and ^oStunned for up to 5 seconds^* depending on how long the Javelin has traveled before impact.

If the Javelin travels farther than {2000,1750,1500,1250} units, then up to a ^obonus {100,200,300,400} Magic Damage is dealt^* based on the distance that the Javelin has travelled.

Deals ^o{90,180,270,360} Magic Damage^* to the first target to pass within a 140 radius of projectile. The target is also Stunned.

Stun duration increases by ^o0.5 seconds for every {200,175,150,125} units the projectile has traveled^*. Stuns for a minimum of 0.5 seconds and a maximum of 5 seconds.

If the Javelin travels ^ofarther than {2000,1750,1500,1250} units^*, then up to a ^obonus {100,200,300,400} Magic Damage^* is dealt based on the distance that the Javelin has travelled.

Bonus damage scales linearly up to 6000 units travelled. Any extra distance will apply the maximum bonus damage

Grants 800 day and night Clearvision around the Javelin; lingers for 3.34 seconds after it disappears.
Valkyrie leaps forward, charging to battle. Her courage inspires nearby allied heroes when she lands, granting increased Movement Speed and Attack Speed.
Activate to leap forward ^o{600,700,800,900} units^*.\n\nUpon landing, applies ^o{5,10,15,20}% Movement Speed and {5,10,15,20} Attack Speed^* to nearby allies.
Transports self ^o{600,700,800,900} units forward^*. Upon landing, applies ^oCourageous Leap^* to heroes in radius around self for 10 seconds.
Valkyrie bends light itself, shrouding all allied heroes on the map in stealth.
Activate to grant all allied heroes a ^o15 second Stealth^*.
Applies Prism to all allied heroes for ^o15^* seconds.
Does not expire from attacking or using abilities

The ancient sagas of the heathen north have long told to the tale of the battle-women known as Valkyries.  For centuries, their ranks have thinned as the old ways have died out and civilization stretched its smothering hand over the frozen wilds.  But some Valkyries still remain, cold and swift as the north wind, wielding their lances with expertise to rival the most veteran Legion warriors.
Valkyrie's suite of skills affords her great flexibility in role. With high survivability, good damage output, and great team synergy, she is able to roam, gank, and farm all at the same time.

The Dark Lady activates the malicious energy in her Wrath Blades, causing her attacks to Silence foes, preventing them from using spells and abilities. The malicious energy in her blades also increase her base damage temporarily.
Activate to apply Dark Blades to yourself for {3,4,5,6} seconds.\n\nDark Blades grant you ^o{35,50,65,80}% Base Damage^* and your attacks ^oSilence for 2.5 seconds^*.
Applies Dark Blades to self for {3,4,5,6} seconds.
The Dark Lady forces her influence onto an enemy unit's soul, tainting it. The target enemy is weakened, taking damage and reduced Movement Speed for a brief duration.
Target an enemy to deal ^o{75,100,125,150} Magic Damage^* and tapering ^o-60% Movement Speed^* for {2,3,4,5} seconds.
Deals {75,100,125,150} Magic Damage and applies Tainted Soul to target for {2,3,4,5} seconds.
I want to consume your soul.
Reduces Movement Speed by 60% initially, recovering to full speed over {2,3,4,5} seconds.
The Dark Lady launches herself toward a target location at incredible speed, attacking enemies as she passes by them.

Target a location to charge to that position, pathing around obstacles. You instantly attack any enemy that you pass through.\n\nAfter the charge, you gain ^o{30,45,60,75} Attack Speed^* for 6 seconds.

Charges toward target location, dealing one attack to each enemy that passes within radius of self. Each consecutive attack during the charge will deal 15% less damage than the previous.\n\nWhen the charge completes, applies Zeal to self for 6 seconds.

Using the depths of her Dark Powers, The Dark Lady poisons the minds of all enemy heroes in an area. For the duration, affected enemy heroes move slightly slower, lose all allied vision and have a reduced sight range.

Target a location to apply Cover of Darkness to all enemy heroes in the area for {4,5,6} seconds.\n\nCover of Darkness applies ^o{-5,-10,-15}% Movement Speed^* and ^oUnlinked Vision^*, reducing their Vision Range to {500,450,400} units and removing any sight they gain from units other than themselves.
Applies Darkness to targets in radius for {4,5,6} seconds.
You're all alone, no one is here beside you!
Shrinks vision radius to {500,450,400}. Unlinks shared vision with allies.

Wielding twin, scythe-like blades, the she-reaper known as the Dark Lady has moved through the Legion's ranks like a shadow of death.  For soldiers seeking to buck up their courage, she is a punch-line: "Careful you don't find the Dark Lady," they joke to their carousing friend.  But even these jokes are accompanied by a shudder.  Swift and cold and lethal as the frozen winds off the steps, black as the cloud-choked night, she is no laughing matter.

The Dark Lady is a late game powerhouse with an exponential power growth, but is highly dependent on proper early and mid-game support. Once she has amassed enough wealth, her Dark Blades and Charging Strikes allow her to burst down entire waves of enemies.
The Vindicator unleashes forgotten lore from within The Book, causing enemy heroes to be impeded by the lore.
Target a position to deal ^o{85,140,195,250} Magic Damage to all enemies within the area^* and ^oDisarm^* player-controlled enemy units for ^o{0.7,1,1.3,1.6} seconds^*.
Target a position to deal ^o{85,140,195,250} Magic Damage to all enemies within the area^* and ^oDisarm^* player-controlled enemy units for ^o{0.7,1,1.3,1.6} seconds^*.
Using the Master's Incantation inscribed within The Book, Vindicator enhances his attacks.

Target an enemy to enhance an attack against them, dealing bonus True damage equal to ^o{0,22,33,44,55}% of your Intelligence^*. Bonus True Damage is ^omultiplied by 1.5 against Silenced targets^*. Right click to auto-cast.\n\nPassively grants Vindicator ^o1 Intelligence permanently^* when he kills a hero, or if an enemy hero dies within 925 radius of Vindicator.

Deals ^o{0,22,33,44,55}% of Vindicator's Intelligence as bonus True damage^* when attacking. Bonus True Damage is ^omultiplied by 1.5 against Silenced targets^*.\n\nPassively grants Vindicator ^o1 Intelligence permanently^* when he kills a hero, or if an enemy hero dies within 925 radius of Vindicator.
The great big book of everything.
Inscribed into the binding of The Book, the Glyph of Silence quiets foes around it and simultaneously impedes their movement.

Target a position to summon an immobile Totem that lasts for ^o5 seconds^* or after it ^oreceives 2 autoattacks^*.

Enemy units within 1000 radius of the Totem receive a ^oMovement Speed Slow up to 30%^* the closer the target is to the Totem (minimum of a 5% Movement Speed Slow).

Enemy units within ^o{300} radius^* of the Totem are also ^oSilenced^* for ^o{1.3,1.7,2.1,2.5} seconds^* upon entering the radius. Only affects a target once per cast.

Target a position to summon an immobile Totem that lasts for ^o5 seconds^* or after it ^oreceives 2 autoattacks^*.

Enemy units within 1000 radius of the Totem receive a ^oMovement Speed Slow up to 30%^* the closer the target is to the Totem (minimum of a 5% Movement Speed Slow). The Movement Speed Slow lingers for 1 second after leaving the radius, after the Totem expires, or becomes destroyed.

Enemy units within ^o{300} radius^* of the Totem are also ^oSilenced^* for ^o{1.3,1.7,2.1,2.5} seconds^* upon entering the radius. Enemies already affected by this Silence will not be silenced if they re-enter this 300 radius within the same cast instance of Glyph of Silence.
Can you read me a bedtime story?
Slow magnitude increases the closer you are to the Totem
Releasing the power held within the final chapter of The Book, Vindicator prevents any spellcasting across the battlefield.

Activate to ^oGlobally^* apply Final Chapter to all enemy heroes, ^oSilencing them for (0.1 * Charges) seconds^* (max duration of {3,4,5} seconds). Enemy heroes also receive a ^o40% Movement Speed Slow for 1 second^*.\n\nFinal Chapter gains ^o{20,25,30} charges^* when coming off cooldown and 1 charge every 4.5 seconds after that. Maximum of ^o{30,40,50} charges^*.

Activate to ^oGlobally^* apply Final Chapter to all enemy heroes, ^oSilencing them for (0.1 * Charges) seconds^* (max duration of {3,4,5} seconds). Bypasses invulnerability. Enemy heroes also receive a ^o40% Movement Speed Slow for 1 second^*.\n\nFinal Chapter gains ^o{20,25,30} charges^* when coming off cooldown and 1 charge every 4.5 seconds after that. Maximum of ^o{30,40,50} charges^*.

From one generation to the next, a reclusive order of hermits have guarded apocryphal writings said to come from the Prophet himself.  Vindicator, still early in his lonely quest, is the last of these lonely sentinels, but he has left his exile behind in order to join the battle against the Hellbourne.  Using the potent verses inscribed in the Great Book, he wields unique and powerful magic.

The Vindicator's power comes from proper clutch usage of Final Chapter as well as sustained damage from Master's Incantation. Intelligent usage of Glyph of Silence and Sage's Lore aids in teamfight and gank disruptions.
Voodoo Jester throws a wretched mix of cursed chemicals at an enemy, stunning them and nearby units one after the other.

Target an enemy unit to apply a ^o1.5 second Stun^*. Bounces to random nearby visible enemies {2,4,6,8} times, applying a ^o1 second Stun^* and 50 Magic Damage to each unit hit.\n\nCreeps are stunned for 5 seconds and take ^o{75,100,125,150} Magic Damage^*

On heroes, stuns for 1.5 seconds initially and 1 second on each additional bounce. Deals {50} Magic Damage to heroes.

 On creeps, deals {75,100,125,150} Magic Damage and stuns for 5 seconds.

Bounces {2,4,6,8} times.

Voodoo Jester afflicts an ally with Good Mojo or an enemy with Bad Mojo. The Good Mojo passes to Voodoo Jester's allies, healing those around the target over time. The Bad Mojo drags down Voodoo Jester's enemies, causing those around the target to take Magic Damage over time.

Target an Ally (or self) to apply Good Mojo or an Enemy to apply Bad Mojo for 8 seconds.

Good Mojo heals for ^o{10,20,30,40} Health per second^* in an area around the target.

Bad Mojo deals ^o{10,20,30,40} Magic Damage per second^* in an area around the target.
Applies Good Mojo to an ally or Bad Mojo to an enemy for 8 seconds.
Oh no, I lost my Mojo!
Heals {10,20,30,40} Health per second to allied units in a 340 radius around the affected unit.
Deals {10,20,30,40} Magic Damage per second to enemy units in a 340 radius around the affected unit.
Voodoo Jester curses the very ground the enemy walks on, causing damage to them based on how much life they lost after several seconds.

Target a location to apply Cursed to enemy heroes in the radius for 12 seconds.\n\nEvery 4 seconds Cursed targets take ^o{10,20,30,40}% of Health lost in Magic Damage^* since Cursed was applied. Also takes ^o{5,10,15,20} Magic Damage per second^* while active.
Applies Cursed to targets in radius for 12 seconds.
{5,10,15,20} Magic Damage per second\nEvery 4 seconds, inflicts Magic Damage equal to {10,20,30,40}% of total Health lost since Cursed was applied.
Voodoo Jester channels a deadly Spirit Ward to attack enemy heroes.

^gThis ability can be boosted by Staff of the Master.^*\n\n^gStaff Effect:^* Increases Spirit Ward damage from {60,90,120} to {90,120,150}. Changes Spirit Ward number of attack bounces from {0,0,1} to {0,1,2} additional target(s). No longer channeling (but still cancels if Stunned, Silenced or killed).

Target a location to channel an invulnerable Spirit Ward there for up to 8 seconds. The Spirit Ward will attack the nearest enemy hero, dealing ^o{200,300,400} Physical Damage per second^*. At level 3, the attacks will bounce to an additional target.\n\n^gStaff of the Master^* increases the Spirit Ward's Damage and increases the number of bounces to {0,1,2} additional targets, and is no longer channeling (but still cancels if Stunned, Silenced or killed).

Target a location to channel an invulnerable Spirit Ward there for up to 8 seconds. The Spirit Ward will attack the nearest {1,1,3} enemy heroes, dealing ^o{300,400,500} Physical Damage per second^* to each. ^gIs no longer channeling (but still cancels if Stunned, Silenced or killed).\n\n^gThis ability has been boosted by Staff of the Master.^*

Summons an invulnerable Spirit Ward to attack nearby enemy Heroes.

The Spirit Ward deals {60,90,120} Physical Damage with an attack cooldown of 0.3 seconds. The Spirit Ward's attack bounces to {0,0,1} additional target(s).

The Spirit Ward is channeled and will be destroyed if the channel is cancelled.
^gThis ability has been boosted by Staff of the Master.^*

Summons an invulnerable Spirit Ward to attack nearby enemy Heroes.

The Spirit Ward deals ^g{90,120,150}^* Physical Damage with an attack cooldown of 0.3 seconds. The Spirit Ward's attack bounces to ^g{0,1,2}^* additional target(s).

The Spirit Ward will be destroyed if Stunned, Silenced or killed.

The Voodoo Jester haunts the dreams of countless warriors with his demented laughter, glowing eyes, and deadly magic.  It is said that every time a child weeps, his power grows stronger, though some believe this rumor was invented by parents to quiet their unruly children.

The Voodoo Jester is a strong support best used in the babysitter role paired with a late-game centered damage dealer. His Acid Cocktail can Stun lock charging enemies, while Mojo can simultaneously heal his ally and himself.

Spawns helpful totems at your feet for up to ^o30 seconds^*.

^yLevel 1^* - spawns a ^oFlame Totem^* which deals ^o{40,60,80,100} Magic Damage^* to the weakest nearby enemy up to 4 times.
^yLevel 2^* - spawns a ^oLife Totem^* which ^oHeals^* the weakest nearby ally hero for ^o{15,30,45,60}^* up to 4 times.
^yLevel 3^* - spawns a ^oShock Totem^* which ^oStuns^* the weakest nearby enemy hero for ^o1 second^*.
^yLevel 4^* - causes the ^oShock Totem^* to ^oStun another enemy^* after an additional 2 second delay.

Totems die in 1 hit. Spawning new Sacred Totems removes any old Sacred Totems that are still up.
column3:
На ^o30 сек.^* призывает несколько тотемов возле героя.

^yУровень 1^* - призывает ^oFlame Totem^*, наносящий ^o{40,60,80,100} ед. магического урона^* слабейшему противнику поблизости до 4 раз.
^yУровень 2^* - призывает ^oLife Totem^*, ^oисцеляющий^* слабейшего союзника поблизости на ^o{15,30,45,60} ед. здоровья^* до 4 раз.
^yУровень 3^* - призывает ^oShock Totem^*, ^oоглушающий^* слабейшего противника поблизости на ^o1 сек.^*
^yУровень 4^* - ^oShock Totem^* ^oоглушает еще одного противника^* после задержки в 2 сек.

Тотемы можно уничтожить с 1 удара. Призыв новых тотемов убирает тотемы прошлого призыва.

column2:
Spawns helpful totems at your feet for up to ^o30 seconds^*. Their effects have 700 range.

^yLevel 1^* - spawns a ^oFlame Totem^* which deals ^o{40,60,80,100} Magic Damage^* every second to the weakest nearby enemy up to 4 times.
^yLevel 2^* - spawns a ^oLife Totem^* which ^oHeals^* the weakest nearby damaged ally hero every second for ^o{15,30,45,60}^* up to 4 times.
^yLevel 3^* - spawns a ^oShock Totem^* which ^oStuns^* the weakest nearby enemy hero for ^o1 second^* once after a 2 second delay.
^yLevel 4^* - causes the ^oShock Totem^* to ^ostun another enemy^* after an additional 2 second delay.

Totems die in 1 hit and give 10 gold when killed. Spawning new Sacred Totems removes any old Sacred Totems that are still up.
column3:
На ^o30 сек.^* призывает несколько тотемов возле героя. Радиус действия эффектов тотемов - 700 ед.

^yУровень 1^* - призывает ^oFlame Totem^*, наносящий ^o{40,60,80,100} ед. магического урона^* слабейшему противнику поблизости до 4 раз.
^yУровень 2^* - призывает ^oLife Totem^*, ^oисцеляющий^* слабейшего союзника поблизости на ^o{15,30,45,60} ед. здоровья^* до 4 раз.
^yУровень 3^* - призывает ^oShock Totem^*, ^oоглушающий^* слабейшего противника поблизости на ^o1 сек.^*
^yУровень 4^* - ^oShock Totem^* ^oоглушает еще одного противника^* после задержки в 2 сек.

Тотемы можно уничтожить с 1 удара. За их уничтожение дается 10 золота. Призыв новых тотемов убирает тотемы прошлого призыва.

column2: For when you don't have friends.
Spawn a Spirit to assault your enemies, then choose whether or not to teleport to the Spirit.
column3: Призывает на помощь духа, атакующего противников. Герой может в любой момент телепортироваться к духу.

column2:
Channel to spawn an invulnerable Spirit and transfer control to it for up to ^o3 seconds^*.

The Spirit can pass through all terrain except cliffs, and deals ^o{75,150,225,300} Magic Damage^* and applies a ^o35% Movement Speed Slow for 2.5 seconds^* to enemies it passes through.

Activating this ability again teleports Warchief to the Spirit and dispels it. A secondary activation simply ends the effect early.
column3:
Произносит заклинание, призывая управляемого игроком неуязвимого духа до ^o3 сек.^*

Касаясь противников, дух наносит ^o{75,150,225,300} ед. магического урона^* и ^oуменьшает их скорость передвижения на 35% на 2.5 сек.^* Дух проходит сквозь любые препятствия, кроме утесов.

Повторная активация способности прерывает заклинание и телепортирует вашего героя на место духа. Заклинание можно прервать и без телепортации.

column2: Teleports to the Spirit and dispels it.
column3: Прерывает заклинание и телепортирует героя на место духа.

column2:
Channel to spawn an invulnerable Spirit that moves at 650 Movement Speed, and transfer control to it for up to ^o3 seconds^*.

The Spirit can pass through all terrain except cliffs, and deals ^o{75,150,225,300} Magic Damage^* and applies a ^o35% Movement Speed Slow for 2.5 seconds^* to enemies it passes through.

Activating this ability again teleports Warchief to the Spirit and dispels it. A secondary activation simply ends the effect early.
column3:
Произносит заклинание, призывая управляемого игроком неуязвимого духа до ^o3 сек.^*

Касаясь противников, дух наносит ^o{75,150,225,300} ед. магического урона^* и ^oуменьшает их скорость передвижения на 35% на 2.5 сек.^* Дух проходит сквозь любые препятствия, кроме утесов.

Повторная активация способности прерывает заклинание и телепортирует вашего героя на место духа. Заклинание можно прервать и без телепортации.

column2: Teleports to the Spirit and dispels it.
column3: Прерывает заклинание и телепортирует героя на место духа.

column2: Deals {75,150,225,300} Magic Damage to enemy units you pass through
column3: Наносит {75,150,225,300} ед. магического урона противникам, которых вы касаетесь

column2: Dispels the Spirit and ends the effect early.
Dispels the Spirit and ends the effect early.
Teleports the Warchief to the Spirit and dispels it.
column3: Прерывает заклинание и телепортирует героя на место духа.

column2: Teleports the Warchief to the Spirit and dispels it.
column3: Прерывает заклинание и телепортирует героя на место духа.

column2: Dispels the Spirit and ends the effect early.
Dispels the Spirit and ends the effect early.
Adds bonus Magic Damage on your attacks based on your Intelligence.\n\n
column3: Наносит дополнительный магический урон, основанный на интеллекте вашего героя.\n\n

column2: Passively adds ^obonus Magic Damage equal to {1,1.5,2,2.5}x your Intelligence^* to your next attack against enemy units whenever off cooldown.
column3: Когда способность восстановлена, ваша следующая атака нанесёт ^oдополнительный магический урон размере {1,1.5,2,2.5}x от вашего интеллекта^*.

column2: Passively adds ^obonus Magic Damage equal to {1,1.5,2,2.5}x your Intelligence^* to your next attack against enemy units whenever off cooldown.
column3: Когда способность восстановлена, ваша следующая атака нанесёт ^oдополнительный магический урон размере {1,1.5,2,2.5}x от вашего интеллекта^*.

column2: Speeds up nearby allies and self.

Upon use, emits an aura that buffs nearby allies and self for 12 seconds. Buff increases ^oMovement Speed by 5%, Mana Regeneration by {10,20,30}^*, and causes all non-ultimate cooldowns to ^ogo down twice as fast^*.

The cooldown reduction rate will only reduce the max cooldown of an item or ability to a minimum of 3 seconds.

For Warchief himself, ^ocooldowns go down 4 times as fast.^*
column3: После активации излучает благотворную ауру в течение 12 сек. Союзники под действием ауры получают ^o5% к скорости передвижения^*, ^o{10,20,30} ед. к регенерации маны^*, а их предметы и способности (кроме ультимейтов) восстанавливаются в ^o2 раза быстрее^*, но не менее 3 сек.\n\nУ вашего героя способности и предметы восстанавливаются ^oв 4 раза быстрее^*.

column2: Upon use, emits an aura that applies ^oWarcry^* to self and ally heroes within 900 range for ^o12 seconds^*.\n\n^oFor Warchief himself, cooldowns go down 4 times as fast.^*
column3: После активации в течение ^o12 сек.^* излучает благотворную ауру ^oWarcry^* в радиусе 900 ед.\n\n^oУ вашего героя способности и предметы восстанавливаются в 4 раза быстрее.^*

column2: The mind moves differently when listening to the horn.
All non-ultimate ability and item cooldowns go down 4 times as fast.
column3: Способности (кроме ультимейтов) и предметы восстанавливаются в 4 раза быстрее.

column2: All non-ultimate ability and item cooldowns go down twice as fast.\n\nThe cooldown reduction rate will only reduce the max cooldown of an item or ability to a minimum of 3 seconds.
column3: Способности (кроме ультимейтов) и предметы восстанавливаются в 2 раза быстрее, но не менее 3 сек.

column2: Warchief is a Semi-Carry Ganker with a powerful teamfight presence. Using Spirit Walk and Sacred Totems, Warchief stays ahead of his enemies in lane and when ganking. In a teamfight, Warcry provides one of the strongest buffs in the game, granting himself and all nearby allies hastened ability and item cooldowns.
column3: Warchief - ганкер с полу-керри потенциалом, лучше всего раскрывающий себя в командных сражениях. Spirit Walk и Sacred Totems позволяют ему доминировать на линии и устраивать засады. В командных сражениях Warcry является одним из сильнейших усиливающих эффектов, сокращая вам и вашим союзникам время восстановления способностей и предметов.

column2: Most at home on holy ground, the Witch Slayer creates a temporary Graveyard in front of himself. Enemy units caught in its creation suffer the consequences.
Target a location or unit to deal ^o{80,140,200,260} Magic Damage^* in a line and apply a ^o{1.3,1.7,2.1,2.5} second Stun^*.

Creates a Graveyard for 700 units in the target direction. Any enemies hit will fly into the air for 0.52 seconds and are Stunned for {0.8,1.2,1.6,2} seconds when they land, taking {80,140,200,260} Magic Damage.
The Witch Slayer has mastered the use of the gem socketed into his glove, letting him shrink an enemy, rendering them useless for a short time.
Target a unit to debuff it for ^o{2,2.5,3,3.5} seconds^*, causing it to move slower and be unable to attack, cast spells, or use items. Instantly kills enemy illusions and dispels stealth.
Applies Miniaturization to the target enemy for {2,2.5,3,3.5} seconds, settings its base Movement Speed to 100. Instantly kills enemy illusions and dispels stealth.
Base Movement Speed set to 100.\nNegates Evasion
Over the years the Witch Slayer has learned how to drain the power of his enemies for his own use.
Target an enemy unit to channel a mana drain for 4 seconds, giving its mana to you. Mana is drained at a rate of ^o{25,50,75,100} Mana per second^*.\n\nInstantly kills enemy illusions.
Applies Power Drain to target for duration of the channel. The Witch Slayer gains mana equal to the mana drained.\n\nInstantly kills illusions.
I'm just going to borrow this!
With no other option left, the Witch Slayer fires a Silver Bullet from his gun at the target enemy. The impact usually leaves them in many small pieces.
^gThis ability can be boosted by Staff of the Master.^*\n\n^gStaff Effect:^* Changes damage type to Superior Magic and increases damage done.
Target an enemy unit to shoot it with a Silver Bullet, dealing ^o{500,650,850} Magic Damage^*.\n\n^gStaff of the Master^* Changes damage type to Superior Magic and increases damage done.
With no other option left, the Witch Slayer fires a ^gHeavenly Blast^* from his gun at the target enemy. The impact usually leaves them in many small, but blessed, pieces.
^gThis ability has been boosted by Staff of the Master.
Target an enemy unit to shoot it with a Silver Bullet, dealing ^o{600,800,1025} Superior Magic Damage^*.\n\n^gThis ability has been boosted by Staff of the Master.^*
Deals ^g{600,800,1025}^* Superior Magic Damage to target.
Nothing can save her now except for Silver Bullets!

No city is more pious in its worship of Sol than Arasunia, and no man is more fervent among its zealous citizens than the Witch Slayer.  Although he is viewed with uncertainty by the Beast shamans and human sorcerers in the Legion, his combat prowess and holy powers make him a mighty ally.  Wielding a musket and a bladed icon of Sol, he not only can hold his own in battle, but also can sap his enemy's strength and turn any ground into sacred territory.

The Witch Slayer has one of the most complete suites of disables and damage spells in Newerth. Best played as a support, the Witch Slayer can both initiate fights with Graveyard and end them with Silver Bullet.
War Beast Summons forth Hellhounds from the underworld to attack his enemies.

Activate to summon 2 Hellhounds for ^o55 seconds^*.\n\n Hellhounds have ^o{400,475,550,625} Health^*, deal ^o{30,35,40,45} average Damage^*, ^o3 Armor^*, and have a ^o{0,30,30,30}% chance^* to critical strike for ^o1.5x damage^*. Level 4 Hellhounds are invisible while not attacking.

Summons 2 Hellhounds for 55 seconds.

Hellhounds have {400,475,550,625} Health, deal {30,35,40,45} Physical Damage per attack, 3 Armor, and have an attack cooldown time of 1.25 seconds. Their attacks have a {0,30,30,30}% chance to do 1.5x normal damage.

Level 4 Hellhounds gain invisibility when not attacking.

Hellhounds cannot attack towers unless War Beast is within 925 units.

Summons 2 Hellhounds for 55 seconds.

Hellhounds have {400,475,550,625} Health, deal {30,35,40,45} Physical Damage per attack, 2 Armor, and have an attack cooldown time of 1.25 seconds. Their attacks have a {0,30,30,30}% chance to do 1.5x normal damage.

Hellhounds cannot attack towers unless War Beast is within 925 units.

Applies Battle Cry to self and all allied heroes for 16 seconds.\n\nApplies Rallied to all allied player controlled units for 16 seconds. This buff does not grant assists to War Beast.

Increases Movement Speed of self and all owned units to Maximum and grants unitwalking.

Once a hound keeper in the underworld, War Beast heeded the call to arms in order to feed the victims of Newerth to his pets. War Beast's allegiance was never questioned. His hunger for carnage remains unending, feeding the animal within.

The War Beast is relegated to killing neutrals with Hellhounds from the onset of the game. However, once he has reached a reasonable level of power, he can easily solo-kill Kongor and push down towers with a combination of Hellhounds and Puzzlebox.
