Activate to create blades for 8 seconds around the Torturer that hit one random target every .25 seconds for ^o{9.375,18.75,28.125,37.5} Physical Damage^*.\n\nThe blades deal a total of ^o{300,600,900,1200} Physical Damage^*, can hit Buildings for 50% damage, and do not stop when Torturer is killed.

Many years ago, the Torturer was just a dying man who made a pact to serve the Hellbourne in exchange for eternal life. However, to ensure his loyalty without the distraction of physical temptations, the Hellbourne stripped the man of his physical body leaving the pure energy of destruction, agony, and hate.

The Torturer is a spell-based damage dealer best positioned in the midst of his opponents. While Impalement and Torment will do incredible damage over time, the Torturer's low base survivability requires augmentation through items.

Don't make me angry, you wouldn't like me!

Is the mighty Wildsoul a Beast who dreamed himself a Man, or a Man who dreamed himself a Beast?  As much a bear as a human, this druidic warrior draws upon primordial woodland energies to strengthen himself and crush those who threaten the natural life of Newerth.
Wildsoul is effective in both the lane and the jungle. He can Summon Booboo to provide himself a permanent companion capable of using items. To this effect, he is two heroes in one.
Zephyr summons a gust of wind in the direction of his choosing, pushing and dealing damage to enemies it hits.
Click and drag the cursor in a direction to summon a Gust of Wind.\n\nThe Gust pushes enemies in the targeted direction, dealing ^o{70,140,210,280} Magic Damage^* and a applying a ^oMini-Stun^*.
All units caught in the wind cone are ^opushed^* in the direction of the wind, dealt ^o{70,140,210,280} Magic Damage^*, and Stunned for 0.1 seconds.
Zephyr spawns a small Cyclone on every kill he makes. Spawned Cyclones automatically patrol around Zephyr and damage enemies they touch. Zephyr can, on command, consume a Cyclone to heal himself.

Passively spawns a Cyclone once every 20 seconds, and when Zephyr kills a unit, up to a max of ^o{2,4,6,8} Cyclones^*. Each Cyclone deals ^o8 Magic Damage per second^* around Zephyr and lasts 40 seconds.\n\nActivate to consume one Cyclone, ^orestoring 20 Health^*. Heals for the same amount when a Cyclone expires.

Spawns a Cyclone which lasts ^o40 seconds^* and deals ^o8 Magic Damage^* per second to enemy units it touches.

When the Cyclone is consumed it heals Zephyr for ^o20 Health^*. Heals for the same amount when a Cyclone expires.

Cyclones are also spawned once every 20 seconds.

Can have a maximum of ^c{2,4,6,8} cyclones^* active at any one time.

Zephyr uses his control of the wind to create a rushing barrier around himself, granting him ^o5% Bonus Movement Speed^* and ^o{15,20,25,30}% Evasion^*.\n\nIf the attacker is within 250 radius when the attack hits Zephyr, Wind Shield will not grant Evasion against that attack instance.

Passively grants ^o5% Bonus Movement Speed^* and ^o{15,20,25,30}% Evasion^*.\n\nIf the attacker is within 250 radius when the attack hits Zephyr, Wind Shield will not grant Evasion against that attack instance.
This ability contains ^yEvasion^* properties. Evasion properties do not stack. Instead, you will automatically use the Evasion from the item or ability that grants you the highest chance to evade.

Zephyr creates a mighty Typhoon, slowing Movement Speed and dealing damage to any units near it. The closer an enemy is to the center of the Typhoon, the higher the damage and speed reduction becomes.\nGrants 600 day and night Clearvision while active.

Target a location to create a Typhoon there. Enemies in the Typhoon are dealt up to ^o{60,80,100} Magic Damage per second^* and up to ^o-99% Movement Speed^*, increasing the closer they are to the center.\n\nThe Typhoon lasts ^o{6,8,10} seconds^* and spawns one Cyclone per second.

Spawns a Typhoon at the target location, Grants Zephyr ^o1 Cyclone per second^* while Typhoon is active and applies ^oHarsh Winds^* to enemies who remain in a 550 radius.

Charges are based on the distance an enemy is from the center of the Typhoon. The closer they are, the more charges are applied.

The Typhoon lasts {6,8,10} seconds.
Deals up to {60,80,100} Magic Damage per second

A riddler, a sage, and a lover of sweets, Zephyr sadly is known in these times simply as a warrior of the winds.  Though he chose not to participate in the Beast Horde's war with the humans, he has joined battle against the Hellbourne, and the powerful winds and aerial attacks he calls down upon the daemons are a welcome addition to the new Legion.

Zephyr's damage output comes entirely through his maintenance of Cyclones, so Zephyr's sole imperative throughout much of the game is to build as much survivability as possible through farming. In a team fight, his Gust and Typhoon can disrupt an entire team.

Враги и здания, задетые атаками или способностями вашего героя, поджигаются и получают ^o{1,2,3,4} ед. магического урона в сек.^* Эффект способности складывается несколько раз.

column2: Using power granted from Sol, Pyromancer hurls a blazing hot fireball at a target enemy, dealing massive damage.
column3: Используя силу, полученную от Сола, Pyromancer бросает пылающий огненный шар в указанного врага, нанося огромный урон.

column2: It's kinda like pitching a baseball. Of fire.
column3: Это похоже на подачу бейсбольного мяча. Огненного.

column2: For centuries, the Sacred Order has recognized the "Flame-Touched," those men and women filled with a burning, if more than slightly mad, devotion to Sol.  Those Flame-Touched who serve in the Legion are more commonly called Pyromancers for their mastery over fire, and creatures strongly attuned to that element.
column3: На протяжении веков Священный Орден признавал "тронутых пламенем" всех тех мужчин и женщин, которые были полны горящей (если не сумасшедшей) преданности Солу. Тех, кто служит Легиону, чаще называют Pyromancers за их умение повелевать огнем и существами, которые из него состоят.

column2: The Pyromancer is a spike Magic Damage dealer that can incinerate an enemy within seconds by using his three damage spells in quick succession. Because his Dragonfire Stun is delayed on cast, he is best paired with another hero with a ranged Stun.
column3: Pyromancer — боец, быстро наносящий магический урон и способный за секунды испепелить врага с помощью серии из трёх разрушительных заклинаний. Так как оглушение с помощью Dragonfire срабатывает не сразу, этому герою лучше ходить в паре с другим героем, способным оглушать издалека.

column2: As a student of the hidden forces of Newerth ascends in rank, he is awarded an Acolyte's Staff. By augmenting the acolyte's already impressive mental prowess, the crystalline staff is meant to open the way to the final secrets and eventual masterhood. In these times of strife, however, the staffs have found their way into many bloody and untutored hands.
column3: Каждый ученик скрытых войск Новоземья получает такой посох при повышении до послушника. Усиливая и без того впечатляющие ментальные способности послушников, посох помогает достичь просветления и развить их способности до предела. Однако, в эти темные времена посохи попадают и в другие руки. В окровавленые руки невежд и разбойников.
column4: скрытых войск => скрытых сил

column2: Alacrity Bands were conjured by The Divine Coterie as a means to quicken their tumbling, juggling, and stage combat in order to further impress their audiences. They didn't care if the crowd was made of peasants or nobles -- they just wanted to put on an amazing show. When a half-drunk and superstitious baron accused them of witchcraft for possessing such agility and ordered them burned at the stake, the performers found another purpose for the Alacrity Bands: defending oneself and attacking one's assailant with a stunning level of speed and zeal. It was a short matter of time before the accessories were carried into battle, and the mass graves began to fill faster than ever.

column2: Apprentice's Robes are ornamented with mystic runes that help remind the wearer of certain important rituals and thus lend him the air of greater intelligence than he may personally possess."\t
column3: Узоры мистических рун покрывают эту мантию сверху донизу. Они напоминают носителю о важных ритуалах и позволяют прикоснуться к великой, недостижимой мудрости."\t
column4: Узоры мистических рун покрывают Apprentice's Robe сверху донизу, напоминая владельцу о важных ритуалах и позволяя прикоснуться к великой недостижимой мудрости."\t

column2: Favored weapons of one particularly hulking clan of daemons, Axes of the Malphai bestow fantastic strength to those who wield them in battle.  There is little more terrifying than a phalanx of smoldering foes clutching such axes as they march into battle.
column3: Любимое оружие одного клана особо огромных демонов. Дарует своему носителю невероятную силу. Нет ничего более ужасающего, чем стройные ряды пылающих демонов, марширующих держа свои топоры.
column4: Любимое оружие одного клана особо огромных демонов, оно дарует своему владельцу невероятную силу. Нет ничего более ужасающего, чем стройные ряды пылающих демонов, марширующих с топорам наперевес.

column2: Particularly popular among the savage barbarians strong enough to wield two at once, Bastard Swords are common but deadly blades found across Newerth.
column3: Подобные мечи особенно популярны у диких варваров, достаточно сильных, чтобы орудовать двумя клинками сразу. Они распространены по всему Новоземью, но обыденность не делает эти мечи менее смертоносными.

column2: Bestowed by King Maliken--before he was corrupted--to his most trusted captains, Bolstering Armbands bestow strength to any who wears them, and a confidence in the righteousness of one's cause.
column3: До своего падения, король Маликен даровал такие поручи своим самым преданным военачальникам. Такие поручи, помимо силы, даруют носителю непоколебимость в своих убеждениях.
column4: До своего падения Король Maliken даровал Bolstering Armband своим самым преданным военачальникам. Bolstering Armband, помимо силы, даруют носителю непоколебимость в собственных убеждениях.

column2: Through a powerful and religiously suspect ritual learned in part from Beast shamans, it is possible to link a Ward of Revelation to a soldier, creating a Bound Eye that he can carry into battle and use to descry stealthed enemies.
column3: С помощью сложного религиозного ритуала, позаимствованного у звериных шаманов, можно привязать Ward of Revelation к воину, создав таким образом Bound Eye. В бою этот артефакт помогает обнаруживать невидимых врагов.

column2: Particularly popular among the savage barbarians strong enough to wield two at once, Broadswords are common but deadly blades found across Newerth.
column3: Подобные мечи особенно популярны у диких варваров, достаточно сильных, чтобы орудовать двумя клинками сразу. Они распространены по всему Новоземью, но обыденность не делает эти мечи менее смертоносными.

column2: These magic bananas instantly restore massive amounts of Health and Mana.\n\n^rObtained by slaying Kongor (or a few other bosses).^*
column3: Эти волшебные бананы мгновенно восстаналивают огромное количество здоровья и маны.\n\n^Выпадают из убитого Конгора (и нескольких других боссов).^*

column2: On use, restores 2500 Health and 1000 Mana.
column3: При использовании восстанавливает 2500 ед. здоровья и 1000 ед. маны.

column2: For decades, it has been a running joke in the Legion of Man that a good banana can get a warrior through thick or thin. Now, due a strange confluence of mystic energies, a banana has been imbued with the power to restore massive amounts of Health and Magic, and the old saw has proven true.
column3: В Легионе людей десятилетиями бродит байка о том, что спелый банан поставит на ноги хоть слабого, хоть сильного. И верно, под влиянием неведомой волшебной силы часть бананов может безмерно взбодрить тело и дух. Вот и не верь после этого солдатским россказням.

column2: A living, seething bundle of energy created by the interaction of four attuned glowstones, a Blessed Orb is one of the most powerful uses of Ancient technology. These mighty devices significantly improve all attributes, making a mighty hero of any who has one.
column3: Blessed Orb, это живой, бурлящий пучок чистой энергии, рожденный слиянием четырех Glowstone и оказавшийся одним из мощнейших древних артефактов. Этот артефакт способен сделать могучего героя из любого, кто возьмет его в руки.
column4: Blessed Orb - это живой бурлящий пучок чистой энергии, рожденный слиянием четырех Glowstone и оказавшийся одним из мощнейших древних артефактов. Он способен сделать могучего героя из любого, кто возьмет его в руки.

column2: Crushing Claws are filled with clockwork gears, sprockets, and springs that give a boost of strength to whomever wears them.  Despite their role in numerous practical jokes gone awry, these gauntlets remain in widespread use in the ranks.
column3: Эти перчатки наполнены зубчатыми шестеренками, ремнями и цепочками, увеличивающими силу владельца. Не смотря на то, что их уже почти не используют для розыгрышей, число способов их применения не истощается.
column4:
Crushing Claws наполнены зубчатыми шестернями, звёздочками и пружинами. Это механизм, который увеличивает силу своего носителя. Не смотря на то, что их уже почти не используют для розыгрышей, они продолжают пользоваться популярностью среди воинов. (вариант Ардуум)

Crushing Claws наполнены зубчатыми шестернями, звёздочками и пружинами, соединяясь в механизм, который увеличивает силу владельца. Несмотря на то, что их уже почти не используют для розыгрышей, они продолжают пользоваться популярностью среди воинов. (вариант Нексус)

column2: Little humor has survived in these bleak times, but goofy, quacking Duck Boots provide laughter from time to time. First created by a Beast shaman indignant at a haughty human warrior's demand for "shoes that will make me agile," these boots barely do what was requested--at the price of much dignity.
column3: В эти темные времена редко услышишь добрую шутку, но эти несуразные крякающие башмаки всегда вызывают смех. Впервые они были созданы одним из звериных шаманов в ответ на слишком надменное требование людских воинов сделать им повышающую ловкость обувь. Незадачливые просители получили, что хотели: башмаки делают владельца прытким, хоть и ценой ущемлённой гордости.
column4: В наше невесёлое время редко услышишь добрую шутку, но несуразные и крякающиеDuck Bootsвсегда вызывают смех. Впервые они были созданы одним из звериных шаманов в ответ на слишком надменное требование людских воинов сделать им повышающую ловкость обувь. Незадачливые просители получили, что хотели: башмаки делают владельца прытким, хоть и ценой ущемлённой гордости.

column2: On use, temporarily Reveals stealthed units in a large radius.\n^y2 charges.^*
column3: При использовании разоблачает невидимок в большой области. \n^y2 заряда.^*

column2: A mere sprinkle of the Dust of Revelation and any unseen enemy will shimmer with the glowing powder's sheen. Prepared according to a technique passed down orally for generations among a sect of reclusive holy sisters, it is now a critical war asset for both factions.
column3: Одна лишь щепотка этой пыли заставляет невидимок вокруг сверкать всеми цветами радуги. Пыль создаётся по передаваемому из уст в уста рецепту, известному лишь ордену монахинь-затворниц. В военное время пыль становится ценным ресурсом для обеих фракций.

column2: Enemies in radius are ^oSighted^* for ^o3 seconds^* and ^oRevealed^* for ^o12 seconds^*.
column3: Противники в радиусе действия ^oподсвечиваются^* на ^o3 сек.^* и ^oразоблачаются^* на ^o12 сек.^*

column2: Activate to grant a tapering 75 Movement Speed to nearby allies for 10 seconds.
column3: При использовании дает союзникам поблизости 75 ед. скорости передвижения. Эффект постепенно ослабевает в течение 10 сек.

column2: Activate to grant a ^otapering 75 Movement Speed^* to allies in a 600 unit radius for ^o10 seconds^*.\n\nNon-hero player controlled units gain Unitwalking.
column3: При использовании дает союзникам в радиусе 600 ед. ^75 ед. скорости передвижения^*. Эффект постепенно ^oослабевает в течение 10 seconds^*.\n\nСущества, не являющиеся героями получают хождение сквозь воинов.

column2: Craving power without end, Newerth's best magicians finally evoked this mystical artifact. Although simple of design, this device enabled both the Hellbourne hordes and the Legion armies to move with speed unparalleled by anything known before. The appearance of Blitz was only a natural consequence, perceiving a challenge he could best.
column3: Благодаря бесконечной жажде власти, лучшие маги Новоземья наконец сотворили этот таинственный артефакт. Несмотря на внешнюю простоту, реликвия одарила и орду Преисподней и армию Легиона невиданной ранее скоростью передвижения.

column2: Applies an ^oaura^* to all nearby allies. This aura does not stack with itself or items it builds into.
column3: ^oУсиливает^* ближайших союзников. Эта аура не складывается сама с собой и с другими аурами со схожим эффектом.

column2:
This item contains a passive ^yMagic Armor^* bonus which does not stack with other ^yMagic Armor^* items.

^yMagic Armor Aura^*, however, does stack with other Magic Armor items.

This item can be ^tdisassembled^*.
column3: Аура усиления ^yмагической брони^* не складывается с другими подобными аурами, однако, складывается с остальными эффектами, увеличивающими магическую броню.\n\nЭтот предмет можно ^tразобрать^*.

column2: ^oMagic Armor Modifier^*\nGrants an aura and heals on cast, use to grant spellvamp.
column3: ^oМодификатор магической брони^*\nДарует ауру и превращает потраченную ману в здоровье. Активируйте, чтобы ненадолго получить магический вампиризм.

column2: Grants ^o100% Magic Damage Lifesteal^* against heroes and 500% Mana Regeneration for ^o6 seconds^*.
column3: Дает ^o100% магического вампиризма^* против героев и 500% регенерации маны на ^o6 сек.^*

column2: Healed for 45% of Mana spent\n\nIf the healing exceeds your max Health, applies a shield of equal value for 10 seconds
column3: 45% потраченной маны превращается в здоровье. \n\nЕсли здоровье уже полное, потраченная мана превращается в щит, поглощающий урон в течение 10 сек.

column2: Place to temporarily grant vision of the nearby area for 6 minutes.
column3: Развеивает туман войны в указанном месте в течение 6 минут.

column2: Only one quarry in all the lands of Newerth yields up the stone that can be used to make Wards of Sight -- mystic columns that serve as unmanned look-out towers.  The art of carving these menhirs is a close-kept secret of a single family of craftsmen, fortunately one large enough not to be at risk of a daemonic raid.
column3: Всего в одном карьере во всем Новоземье добывают особые камни, которые идут на изготовление Ward of Sight - загадочных столбов для наблюдения за округой без помощи дозорных. Секрет их изготовления хранится в тайне семьей мастеров-каменотесов. К счастью, они весьма плодовиты, и всех демонам не перебить.

column2:
Places a ^oWard of Sight^* at target location which lasts ^o6 minutes^* or until destroyed.

The Ward of Sight provides 1600 day and night vision and is ^oStealthed^*. Dies in 4 hits.

If the ward lasts full duration, you are ^grefunded 50%^* of the cost.
column3:
Размещает ^oWard of Sight^* в указанном месте на ^o6 минут^*.

Развеивает туман войны в радиусе 1600 ед. вне зависимости от времени суток. ^oWard of Sight^* ^oневидим^* и может быть разрушен с 4 ударов.

По окончании времени действия владельцу ^gвозвратится 50%^* стоимости ^oWard of Sight^*, если враги не успеют его сломать.

column4: fleetfeet,feetfeet,bootsofelvenskin,bootsofelfskin,bootsofelfenskin,elveskin,elfskin,elvesskin,elvenskin,6a,6agi,6agility,agility,agi,ff,boe,6аги,6ловкость,6ловкости,аги,ловкость
glovesoftheswift,glovesofswift,swiftgloves,swift,glovesofhaste,gloveofhaste,gots,goh,gos,15as,15attackspeed,attackspeed,as,sg,15ас,15скоростьатаки,15скоростиатаки,ас,скоростьатаки,перчаткискорости

column2: The most popular component in the apparel of the Gentlemen of the Night--the band of thieves that plagues Adkarna--are Gloves of the Swift.  These marvels give one far quicker hands, helpful to warriors seeking faster attacks.
column3: Среди экипировки Джентльменов ночи - банды воров, терризирующих жителей Адкарны - чаще всего можно обнаружить эти перчатки. Их любят за волшебство, которое делает пальцы ловкими, а воинам помогает быстрее управляться с оружием.
column4: Среди экипировки Gentlemen of the Night -- банды воров, терризирующих жителей Adkarna -- чаще всего можно обнаружить эти перчатки. Их любят за волшебство, которое делает пальцы ловкими, а воинам помогает быстрее управляться с оружием.
200 здоровья\n120 маны
glowstone,glow,pointbooster,point,health,hp,mana,mp,life,energy,gs,200h,150m,200l,150e,200хп,200здоровье,200здоровья,хп,здоровье,200мп,200мана,200маны,мп,мана

column2: The product of a failed attempt to control and stabilize its energies, a Glowstone gives greater Health and magical power to anyone who holds one.  "May all failures be so fruitful," as the alchemist says.
column3: Glowstone - результат неудачного эксперимента, в ходе которого, вместо контролируемого и стабильного источника энергии появился предмет, увеличивающий здоровье и магические способности владельца. Как говорят алхимики: «всегда бы мне так ошибаться».
column4: Glowstone - результат неудачного эксперимента, в ходе которого вместо контролируемого и стабильного источника энергии появился предмет, увеличивающий здоровье и магические силы владельца. Как говорят алхимики: "Всегда бы мне так ошибаться."

column2: Activate to give yourself and your nearby units invisibility for 30 seconds.
column3: Используйте, чтобы сделать себя и ближайших союзников невидимыми на 30 сек.

column2: A horrid concoction created to hide predators from prey.
column3: Ужасная смесь, способная скрыть хищника от его добычи.

column2: Activate to give yourself and your nearby units ^oinvisibility^* and ^o+20% Movement Speed^* for ^o30 seconds^*. This invisibility cannot be seen through with revelation.\n\nWalking within a 1000 radius of a visible enemy or tower removes the effect and disables the item.
column3: Используйте, чтобы сделать себя и ближайших союзников ^oневидимыми^* на ^o30 сек.^* Также дает ^o20% дополнительной скорости передвижения^* Скрытых таким образом героев невозможно обнаружить никакими способами.\n\nЭффект пропадает, если подойти к вражеской башне или герою ближе, чем на 1000 ед. Невидимые вражеские герои не прерывают эффект.

column2: Dispels within 1000 radius of a visible enemy hero or tower.
column3: Эффект пропадает, если приблизиться к вражеской башне или герою ближе, чем на 1000 ед. Невидимые вражеские герои не прерывают эффект.

column2: Upgrade to Winged Courier for 200 gold.
Upgrades a Courier to a flying Winged Courier for 200 gold.

The player who uses this skill spends 200 gold and upgrades the Ground Courier into a Winged Courier, granting it the following:
-Grants flying and increases Movement Speed to 350.
-Takes 2 hits to kill by melee units and Towers, or 3 hits from ranged units.
-Has the abilities Speed Boost (Max Movement Speed for 20 seconds) and Courier Shield (Invulnerability for 4 seconds).
-Gold bounty increased to 300.
Causes the Courier to run to your hero and drop all items you own into your inventory if you have room.
Causes the Courier to run to your hero and drop all items you own into your inventory if you have room.
Causes the Courier to run back to the base.
Causes the Courier to run back to the base.
Runs to the nearest friendly well.
When activated, spawns a Ground Courier under your control.\n\nInitial stock of 1. A stock is refreshed every 10 seconds.
Summons a Ground Courier to bring your items to you and your team.

The tragra monkey is one of the quickest and most intelligent of lesser primates, and is a favorite Monkey Courier of jungle witches, Beast shamans, and traveling conjurers.  With their nimble hands and strong arms, they are able to carry items to and from bases, and they never forget their way home.

Spawns a Ground Courier at your target location.

The Ground Courier can carry items, and deliver and take items from the base and stash. If the Courier dies, it will drop its inventory.

The Ground Courier has 45 Health, 300 Movement Speed, and is immune to abilities and Splash damage.

Purchased couriers must be shared for your allies to use it.

Can be upgraded into a Winged Courier.
Consumable.\n\nMax of 1 Flying Courier per player.
Summons a Flying Courier to bring your items to you and your team.

The tragra monkey is one of the quickest and most intelligent of lesser primates, and is a favorite Monkey Courier of jungle witches, Beast shamans, and traveling conjurers.  With their nimble hands and strong arms, they are able to carry items to and from bases, and they never forget their way home.

^oSpawns a Flying Courier^* at your location.

The Flying Courier can ^ocarry items^*, and deliver and take items from the base and stash.

If the Courier dies, it will drop its inventory. Consumables dropped in this manner are visible and can be destroyed or picked up by the enemy team.

Purchased couriers must be shared for your allies to use it.

A simple blessing upon a barely-adorned copper ring is all that is necessary to create a Guardian Ring, which offers weak protection against attacks.  An old soldiers' joke runs, "Barely good for anything, but barely alive is better than dead."
column3: Для создания Guardian Ring надо всего лишь благословить медное незатейливо украшенное колечко. Такой артефакт лишь чуть-чуть улучшает защиту владельца. Как говорят старые солдаты: "Защищает едва, да чуть, но лучше быть едва живым, чем окочуриться."

column2: 15% chance to deal 40 Physical Damage to target.
21 Damage. 15% chance to deal 40 Bonus Damage.
Halberds are mighty polearms, and while every blow from one is quite dangerous, on occasion they will deliver truly fearful attacks on an enemy.
15% chance to deal 40 Physical Damage to target.
While active: ^ochanges Attack Damage type to Magic^* at the cost of 50 mana per attack. Attacks also apply ^oHarkon's Blade^* to the target for ^o5 seconds^*.
When active, transforms your attacks into Magic Damage.
Use to heal target 400 Health over 10 seconds.
A basic concoction of healing herbs that, over time, will help a wounded warrior recuperate.
^gHas no cooldown in Mid Wars^*.\n\nApplies ^oHealth Potion^* to target for ^o10 seconds^*, regenerating ^o400 Health^* over duration.
Dispelled upon taking Damage from non-Lane-Creeps

Legend tells of a circle of Hell where heroes are subjected to the cruelest of tortures.  These victims are fitted with helmets that protect them from fatal injury and restore their bodies to Health so that their torment can continue without the release of death.  Such is the explanation for Helms of the Victim, brought to Newerth by the Hellbourne.
column3: В легендах говорится про особый круг ада, на котором истязают пленённых героев. Жертвам надевают шлемы, которые защищают мучеников от смертельных ран и постоянно исцеляют тела, что позволяет бесконечно мучать бедолаг и не давать им угодить в блаженные руки смерти. Именно такую славу обрел Helm of the Victim, появившийся в Новоземье со времён вторжения Преисподней.

column2: After channeling completes, teleports hero near the target structure.\n\nHomecoming Stone's channeling is not interrupted by Silence, but will be interrupted by Perplex.
Consumable. Shares cooldown with Post Haste.
Teleports you to a friendly structure.

By drawing upon the invisible bonds that exist between all beings--even daemons--and their home, Homecoming Stones can whisk a soldier across the field of battle and back to a building that he deems a safe haven.  Many a hero has escaped a dangerous scrape by means of these blessed rocks.

After channeling, ^oteleports to target structure^* and applies a stacking 3 second Disarm to the structure.

Channeling takes 4 seconds for Tier 1 Towers, 3.5 seconds for Tier 2 towers, and 3 seconds for all other buildings.

Destroys trees in the area. Perplex effects interrupt the channel.
After channeling completes, teleports hero near the target structure.\n\nHomecoming Stone's channeling is not interrupted by Silence, but will be interrupted by Perplex.
This item contains a ^oLifesteal Modifier^* which does not stack.
column3: Предмет содержит ^oмодификатор вампиризма^*, который не складывается.

column2: The battle-ravaged lands of Newerth are rife with the ghosts of the restless dead. Among them one can find Hungry Spirits willing to yield their life-stealing powers to anyone brave, or foolish, enough to serve as a host.
column3: В повидавших войну краях Новоземья полно призраков неупокоенных мертвецов. Cреди них можно встретить и Hungry Spirit, готовый стать кровососом на службе у любого, кто достаточно храбр или глуп, чтобы связаться с этим живоглотом.

column2: Copies a major rune without consuming it, storing 3 charges of a lesser effect.\n\n^rEffect does not stack with other Ioyn Stones or Bottles.^*
A stone that can copy the essence of a Rune to use on other Allies later.
A stone that can capture the essence of a Rune to use on other Allies later.
Target a rune to copy and store it's effect (does not consume a major rune).

Right-click or target a major Rune to give 3 charges to the Ioyn Stone that last up to 4 minutes. The copied Rune is not consumed. Each charge gives a lesser effect based on the Rune copied, which can be used on yourself or an ally hero.

Copying a Refreshment Rune consumes it and gives 2 charges instead.

Dropping the Ioyn Stone removes all charges.

Applies Ioyn Damage to the target for 12 seconds.

^oDoes not stack with Double Damage.^*

Dropping the Ioyn Stone removes all charges.
Creates one illusion of an ally (or self) you target that deals 35% damage, takes 300% damage, and last for 10 seconds.\n\nDropping the Ioyn Stone removes all charges.
Applies Ioyn Speed to the target for 10 seconds.\n\nDropping the Ioyn Stone removes all charges.
Applies Ioyn Regeneration to the target for 6 seconds.\n\nDropping the Ioyn Stone removes all charges.
Applies Ioyn Stealth to target for 12 seconds. Target can perform actions without breaking Stealth during fade time.\n\nDropping the Ioyn Stone removes all charges.
Applies Ioyn Refreshment to the target for 3 seconds.\n\nDropping the Ioyn Stone removes all charges.
50% chance to block 20 damage (10 for ranged heroes).
column3: 50% шанс заблокировать 20 ед. урона (10 ед. на героях дальнего боя)

column2: A simple shield forged by human blacksmiths for rank-and-file soldiers, Iron Bucklers are too small to protect a warrior from all or even most attacks. Nevertheless, their ease of use and low cost assures that they can be found on most battlefields, often among the dead.
column3: Iron Buckler куются людьми для снаряжения обычных лёгких пехотинцев. Это небольшие щиты, которые слишком малы для нормальной защиты воинов от большинства ударов. Впрочем, эти щиты отличаются простотой использования и дешевизной, что позволяет увидеть их на полях многих сражений, зачастую рядом с трупами.

column2: Only 10 damage is blocked for Ranged Heroes.
column3: Блокирует лишь 10 ед. урона на героях дальнего боя.

column2: Grants a 100% chance to block a small amount of hero damage.

Gives a 100% chance to block 20 Damage when attacked by a hero if wielder is a Melee Hero. Only 10 damage is blocked for Ranged Heroes.\n\nThe chance to block damage is 50% when attacked by non-hero targets.
A specialized device for restoring the Health of its host, the Lifetube accelerates its wearer's metabolic processes, drastically increasing the rate at which one's wounds close and bones mend.
column3: Специальное приспособление для восстановления потерянного здоровья. Lifetube стимулирует обмен веществ в организме владельца, значительно ускоряя заживление ран и сращивание костей.

column2: Increases Spell Damage against creeps and heroes.
+15% Spell Damage vs Heroes\n+20% Spell Damage vs non-hero units
This item's ^yMovement Speed^* bonus does not stack with itself or items it builds into.\n\nThis item can be ^tdisassembled^*.
A sword that will sear flesh twice over.
^oFreeze Modifier^*\nSlows on attack, increases Spell Damage against creeps.
A sword that will flashfreeze foes.
Applies ^oChilled^* to target for ^o3.5 seconds^* if wielded by a ^gmelee^* hero, or ^o2 seconds^* if wielded by a ^granged^* hero. Adds one charge per application. Maximum of ^c3 charges^*.
Always your shining light in the dark.

column4: majortotem,major,totem,strength,str,agility,agi,intelligence,int,mt,4s,4a,4стр,4аги,4сила,4силы,4ловкость,4ловкости,4интеллекта,4интелекта,стр,аги,сила,ловкость,интеллект,интелект,4статы,4всестаты,4всемстатам,статы,всестаты,всемстатам

column2: A charge is gained every time a nearby ^oenemy casts a spell^*. When activated, all charges are removed.
Absorb power from enemy spellcasts. Discharge to gain a bit of Health and Mana.
Restores ^o10 Health^* and ^o15 mana per charge^*. Maximum of ^c10 charges^*.
+1 charge every time an enemy hero in range casts a spell.
Place to temporarily Reveal stealth in the nearby area for 3 minutes.

Only one quarry in all the lands of Newerth yields up the stone that can be used to make Wards of Revelation -- mystic columns that reveal anything that passes nearby, even creatures that normally would be invisible.  The art of carving these menhirs is a close-kept secret of a single family of craftsmen, fortunately one large enough not to be at risk of a daemonic raid.

Places a ^oWard of Revelation^* at target location, which lasts ^o3 minutes^* or until destroyed. The Ward of Revelation provides 200 day and night vision, ^oReveals stealthed units and wards^* in a 800 radius, and is Stealthed.

Upon placement, will grant vision of all enemy Wards in the area for 12 seconds if they had already been placed.

Dies in 4 hits.
Use to regenerate target's Mana by 100 over 20 seconds.
A simple alchemist's nostrum that replenishes magic energy over a period of time.
Applies ^oMana Potion^* to target for ^o20 seconds^*, restoring ^o100 Mana^* over duration.
Dispelled upon taking Damage from non-Lane-Creeps
A specialized device for enhancing the magical energy of its host, the Manatube infuses its wearer with power drawn from Newerth's ley lines, increasing the rate at which one recovers Mana.
column3: Manatube - специальное приспособление для восполнения магической мощи владельца. Она передаёт носителю силу, которую черпает из энергетических потоков Новоземья, тем самым ускоряя восстановление запаса маны.

column2: This item contains a passive ^yMovement Speed^* bonus which does not stack with itself or other boots.
column3: Предмет содержит пассивный бонус ^yскорости передвижения^*, который не складывается с этим же предметом или другими ботинками.

column2: The reclusive inventor who devised Marchers meant to alleviate the exhaustion of campaigning armies by allowing soldiers to move significantly faster. Instead, he discovered they were forced to march for just as many hours and for longer distances.
column3: Эти сапоги придумал один изобретатель, который знал о мире, в основном, из книг. Он создал Marchers в целях борьбы с усталостью солдат на марше. Когда новинка поступила в армию, военные стали гораздо быстрее двигаться и куда громче проклинать учёных, ведь теперь им просто приказывали совершать более длинные переходы.

column2: For decades, wandering hedge-wizards and conjurers would leave a Mark of the Novice in the crib of a child whose star-signs portended a life spent in the study of "magic"--those natural forces incomprehensible to common folk.  Of little practical worth, these trinkets nevertheless help sharpen the intellect and prepare one for the paths of power.
column3: Десятилетиями таинственные странствующие волшебники и кудесники подвешивали Mark of the Novice над кроватками тех детей, которым было предначертано посвятить жизнь изучению магии -- этой природной материи, которая далека от простого люда. Сами по себе эти висюльки бестолковы, но их странная форма порождает привычку напрягать извилины, подталкивая на путь к обретению мощи.

column2: Mighty Blades are technologically enhanced polearms that are useful primarily for granting improved strength to whomever holds them.
column3: Mighty Blade -- это мастерски изготовленное древковое оружие, основное предназначение которого -- увеличивать силу владельцев.

column2: A simple homage to one of the lesser woodland spirits worshipped by the beasts, Minor Totems provide a sort of general confidence that manifests itself in a slight boost to all attributes.
column3: Звери создают Minor Totem для почитания младших лесных духов. Minor Totem придает уверенности в себе, немного увеличивая все характеристики.

column2: This item contains a passive ^yMagic Armor^* bonus which does not stack with other ^yMagic Armor^* items.

Spun with infinite patience by the deft fingers of Beast weavers, Mystic Vestments are as much a symbol of faith as they are a practical defense.  Nevertheless, because each thread is blessed with prayers for protection-and coated with special oils known only to Beast shamans-these thin shirts are often prized by warriors seeking magical defense.

Familiar recipes, helpful rituals, and a great variety of abstruse but seemingly prophetic sayings fill every Neophyte's Book, providing access to a storehouse of information that provides a boost to one's intellect and, likely, a greater boost to his pomposity.
column3: В каждой Neophyte's Book хватает семейных рецептов и полезных ритуалов, а заковыристым, но внушительно звучащим высказываниям и вовсе нет числа. Подобные книги -- собрание сведений, которые могут дать пищу уму, но часто вырабатывают привычку не говорить, а излагать мысли высокопарным слогом.

column4: 15int,15intelligence,luminousprism,prism,lp,intelligence,int,lum,15интеллекта,15интелекта,интеллект,интелект

column2: Applies an ^oaura^* to all nearby allies. This aura does not stack with itself or items it builds into.
This item contains a passive ^yMagic Armor^* bonus which does not stack with other ^yMagic Armor^* items.\n\n^yMagic Armor Aura^*, however, does stack with other Magic Armor items.
^oMagic Armor Modifier^*\nGrants a mana regen and healing aura.

Rumor spread throughout the Forests of Caldavar that a new relic had been conjured by the crazed alchemist Nome. The artifact radiated a rejuvenating aura that soothed even the deepest wounds from battle. Now, with the war for control getting increasingly intense, both Hellbourne and Legion desperately tried utilizing the unique item and quickly added it to their arsenals.
Healed for 30% of Mana spent\n\nIf the healing exceeds your max Health, applies a shield of equal value for 10 seconds
Shield generated from Nome's Wisdom healing that exceeds your Max HP
A beautiful work of craftsmanship and a boon to any warrior fortunate enough to afford it, Platemail is the pinnacle of mundane armor.
column3: Прекрасный образец ремесленного мастерства и желанное приобретение для любого воина, который может позволить себе такую защиту. Platemail - венец развития обычных доспехов.

column2: After obtaining this item, the recipe may be re-purchased to upgrade it. ^rCan be upgraded 2 times.^*
On attack, applies ^oBroken Armor^* to target for ^o5 seconds^*.\n\nAt ^ylevel 3^*, applies a stacking ^o-1 Armor^* debuff to ^oBuildings^* and Gadgets you attack. Max of ^c6 stacks^*.
Reduces enemy Armor on attack.\n^rCan be upgraded 2 times.

Forged by Hellbourne slaves, Shieldbreaker mauls appear to be little more than huge spiked clubs, but the despair and anger poured into their makers gives them the power to inflict massive harm. Each blow of a Shieldbreaker destroys some of its victim's armor, as if the weapon hungered to reach the flesh and blood beneath.
Grants the ability to teleport short distances.
column3: Дает возможность телепортироваться на короткие дистанции.

column2: Portal Keys tear asunder the already tenuous barriers between the dimensions of Newerth and enable one to instantly teleport a modest distance.  Because of the volatile energies released, however, a Portal Key can never be used by one who has recently been injured, lest he be torn asunder himself.
column3: Portal Key разрывает и без того непрочную ткань измерений Новоземья и позволяет владельцам мгновенно переноситься на небольшие расстояния. Учтите, что из-за нестабильности энергетических потоков Portal Key не может использоваться недавно раненым воином, иначе его просто разорвёт на мелкие кусочки.

column2: ^oTeleport self^* to target position.\n\nGoes on a 3 second cooldown if damaged by another player, or when picked up.
column3: ^oТелепортирует вашего героя^* в указанное место.\n\nПредмет имеет время восстановления в 3 сек., если ваш герой получил урон от другого игрока, или предмет был подобран.

column2: A charge is gained every time a nearby ^oenemy casts a spell^*. When activated, all charges are removed.
Allows the wielder to absorb a larger amount of Health and Mana from enemy spellcasts.
Restores ^o10 Health^* and ^o15 mana per charge^*. Maximum of ^c15 charges^*.
+1 charge every time an enemy hero in range casts a spell.
Shares cooldown with ^oSacrificial Stone^* and ^oShield of the Five^*.
This item contains a passive ^yMovement Speed^* bonus which does not stack with itself or other boots.\n\nThis item can be ^tdisassembled^*.
^oMovement Modifier^*\n65 Movement Speed. Use to grant Armor to allies.

Grants ^o+3 Armor^* to allied heroes/structures and applies ^oPlated^* to allied non-hero units in radius for ^o60 seconds^*. Armor bonus on heroes/structures and damage bonus on non-heroes are ^odoubled^* for the first ^o10 seconds^*.\n\nDoes not stack with Sacrificial Stone or Shield of the Five.
Shares cooldown with Homecoming Stone.\n\nThis item contains a passive ^yMovement Speed^* bonus which does not stack with itself or other boots.
^oMovement Modifier^*\n105 Movement Speed. Use to teleport to units and buildings.

After channeling, ^oteleports self^* to target ^oallied unit or structure^* and applies a ^o200 Movement Speed buff^* to self for ^o5 seconds^*. Target is unable to act during the channel time. Perplex effects interrupt the channel.

When ^oout of combat^*, increases Movement speed by 45 and health regeneration by 2.

Out of combat Bonus Movement Speed is removed when the owner takes damage, casts a spell, gets a spell cast on him, attacks, or uses an item.

Using Wards, Bottle, Blight Stones, Potions or Lex Talionis will not remove the bonus speed.
Removed when the owner takes damage, casts a spell, gets a spell cast on him, attacks, or uses an item\n\nUsing Wards, Bottle, Blight Stones, Mana, or Health Potions will not remove this state
After channeling completes, teleports hero near the target structure/unit.\n\nPost Haste's channeling is not interrupted by Silence, but will be interrupted by Perplex.

During the Time of Strife, when dozens of petty warlords aspired to dominion over humanity, many falsely proclaimed themselves king. Each Pretender's Crown--and there are many--gives a modest boost to the wearer's abilities, at the price of seeming slightly ridiculous.
column3: То было Время раздоров. Десятки набравшихся сил воевод рвались к власти над людьми. Многие из них спешили без всякого права назваться королями. Каждая из Pretender's Crown -- а таковых появилось немало -- немного увеличивает характеристики владельца, но частенько сползает набекрень, придавая лжемонарху нелепый вид.

column2: At the cost of countless lives, a technique for creating Refined Glowstones was perfected. These amazing items strengthen the holder in all respects, rapidly restore Health and Magic energy, and negate enemy Magic. Whatever the cost, they are worth it.
\nWhen not on cooldown, ^onegates a single targeted spell^*.
An old mercenary saying warns that one can bring a Punchdagger to a bar, but not to a battlefield. Though they inflict more damage than bare fists, they are hardly the most dangerous of weapons.
column3: Старые наёмники рассказывают, что Punchdagger хорош в трактирах, но не на поле боя. Эта поделка позволяет взять верх над буяном с голыми кулаками, но с боевым оружием ей не сравниться.

column2: Cast on a player-controlled unit to push it in the direction it's facing. Interrupts channeling.

^oPushes target^* player-controlled unit 500 units ^oin the direction it is facing^*. Interrupts channeling.\n\nCannot be cast on immobilized or restrained targets. Destroys trees within 100 radius of the target while it is being pushed.
A short dagger suited to rapid stabbing, Quickblades so accustom their wielders to speedy attack that a soldier carrying one finds himself significantly more agile in all things.
column3: Поскольку короткие кинжалы предназначены лишь для стремительных атак, Quickblade приучают владельцев к проворному обращению с оружием, что благоприятно сказывается на общей ловкости.

column2: Ringmail was for years the standard armor issued to soldiers in the Legion of Man. So much of it abounds in Newerth that it can be found in sizes large enough to accommodate even massive beasts and daemons.
column3: Ringmail годами остаются стандартным обмундированием людских легионеров. За это время их сделали настолько много, что можно отыскать доспех любого размера, даже на здоровенного зверя или тучного демона.

column2: Consumes a tree, healing you for 115 Health over 16 seconds.\n^y3 charges.^*

A favorite tool of the daemons, Blight Stones drain the life out of the ancient trees of Newerth to gradually restore the Health of those who invoke them. So helpful are these bleak runes that many among the Legion are known to carry them as well, despite being deemed anathema by learned Beast shamans.
Consumes target ^otree^* and heals self ^o115 Health^* over ^o16 seconds^*.

Thousands of Scarabs have been uncovered in the Great Waste, left by some civilization lost beneath the shifting sands. These simple artifacts bestow a modest improvement to one's magical recovery and were no doubt used by pagan conjurers in times long past.
column3: Эти рукотворные Scarab -- след исчезнувшей под песками Великой пустыни цивилизации. В мире есть тысячи подобных артефактов: простых поделок, которые незначительно ускоряют восполнение магической энергии. Без сомнения, они вовсю использовались языческими колдунами былой эпохи, и продолжают использоваться в наши дни.

column2: Hissing and spraying steam in all directions, Steamstaves are loud and ungainly things that nevertheless pack an impressive wallop and move with extra speed due to their interesting mechanics.
column3: Исправные Steamstaff постоянно шипят и плюются паром во все стороны. Они шумные и нескладные, зато весьма увесистые и на удивление подвижные благодаря скрытым внутри хитроумным механизмам.

column2: On use, deals ^o250 Physical Damage^* and ^oDisarms^* the target for ^o3.5 seconds^*.
This item contains a passive ^yMovement Speed^* bonus which does not stack with itself or other boots.
^oMovement Modifier^*\n50 Movement Speed. Additional non-combat speed and regen.

If you are ^oout of combat^* for 6 seconds, grants ^o100 Movement Speed^* and ^o2 Health Regeneration^* over 2 seconds.

Bonus Movement Speed and Regeneration is reduced if you are within 900 units of an enemy hero, down to 0 charges at 750 units. Bonuses are removed when you go into combat.

You are considered out of combat if you haven't attacked, used an ability, taken damage, or been targeted by an enemy ability. Using an item besides Wards, Blight Stones, Potions, Bottle, or Lex Talionis will also remove the bonuses.

The High Knights who served Maliken Grimm during his crusades--and are said to have joined him among the daemonic host--were each given a mystical sword, known as a Sword of the High. Some have been recovered, some are lost, but each is preciously valued, for they are honed to such razor sharpness that they inflict terrible damage on any enemy in their path.
column3: Рыцари, некогда ходившие в крестовые походы под началом Maliken Grimm (и, поговаривают, вместе с ним перебежавшие к демонам), владели загадочными мечами. Это оружие известно нам как Sword of the High. Часть мечей была утрачена, часть сохранилась. Все они обладают немалой ценностью из-за вечной бритвенной остроты и страшных ран, которые остаются на телах угодивших под удары врагов.

column2: Said to be an icon of the Gatekeeper of Hell, the Token of Life will bring its possessor back to life when he dies.\n\n^rObtained by slaying Kongor.^*

Said to be an icon of the Gatekeeper of Hell, the Token of Life is a bartering chip that will bring one back, once, from death's grasp before crumbling into dust. None can say for certain what sorcery or unholy pact gives it this power.

^oFreeze Modifier:^* Chilled.

This item's ^yMovement Speed^* bonus does not stack with itself or items it builds into.

This item can be ^tdisassembled^*.
^oFreeze, Firebrand Modifier^*\nSlows on attack, increases Spell Damage against creeps.
Applies ^oChilled^* to target for ^o3.5 seconds^* if wielded by a ^gmelee^* hero, or ^o2 seconds^* if wielded by a ^granged^* hero. Adds one charge per application. Maximum of ^c5 charges^*.
This ancient relic provides Clear Vision in an area around the wielder, and Reveals nearby stealthed units. Clear vision is not obstructed by obstacles.\n\n^rObtained by slaying Kongor.^*
The Token of Vision has a Reveal type of Semi-Eye. Semi-Eye Reveal type can Reveal stealthed Heroes and Items, but not Wards.\n\nThis item is destroyed on death.
Grants 900 Clear Vision. Destroys upon wielder death.
Grants Clear vision in a 900 radius around Self\n900 Reveal Range
Cloaks the wielder and nearby allied heroes for a brief time.
On use, cloaks the user and nearby allied heroes.
Applies Token of Stealth to targets in radius for 45 seconds.

These double-bladed Axes favored by Hellbourne warriors have been given the common name Charred, an ugly old word for an ugly old weapon. All the same, Slayers are quite powerful and can make short work of an enemy.
column3: Подобные двухлезвийные секиры искренне любимы воинами Преисподней. Их прозвали Charred, и это уродливое прозвище прекрасно подходит старому и грубому оружию. Несмотря на вид, Slayer оправдывает свое название и легко способен рассечь противника надвое.

column2: Blunt, brute damage is the goal of Warhammers, and though they are hardly fine in their craftsmanship, they have done well in the service of Beast shamans and others for centuries.
column3: Warhammer создан для мощных дробящих ударов. Пусть и не слишком изящный на вид, он веками отлично служит шаманам и другим бойцам звериных племён.

column2: A fissure in reality itself, the Warpcleft distorts time around whoever holds one, allowing him to attack at incredible speeds.
column3: Warpcleft способен искажать саму реальность и менять течение времени для владельца. В бою это позволяет наносить удары с невероятной скоростью.

column2: Does not refund any gold when sold.\n\n^922Does not stack^* with itself and does not increase the damage from splash/cleave.
column3: Не возвращает часть золота при продаже предмета.\n\n^922Эффект не складывается^* с самим собой и не увеличивает урон по области или урон рассечения.

column2: Grants bonus damage against creeps. Can be thrown at creeps and trees.
column3: Дает увеличенный урон по существам. Использование предмета брошает его в дерево или существо.

column2: Destroys target ^otree^* or deals your ^oAttack Damage^* to an ^oenemy creep, gadget or ward^*.\n\nCooldown is halved if targeting a tree, gadget or ward.
column3: Уничтожает указанное ^oдерево^* или наносит урон в размере вашей ^oсилы атаки^* ^oвражескому существу, устройству или стражу^*.\n\nЕсли в качестве цели указано дерево, устройство или страж, время восстановления сокращается наполовину.

column2: +32% Damage vs. Enemy Non-Hero Units (Melee Only)\n+12% Damage vs. Non-Hero Units (Ranged Only)
column3: =+32% урона по вражеским существам (для героев ближнего боя)\n+12% урона по вражеским существам (для героев дальнего боя)

column2: This item contains an ^428Activation Modifier^*. Using this item disables other items with this modifier for the duration.
^428Activation Modifier^*\nGrants physical immunity but Disarms yourself.
Applies ^oVoid Talisman^* to self for ^o4 seconds^*.

Favored by elegant killers, Dancing Blades are both deadly and fast, bestowing more agility, more attacking speed, and even a greater evasive ability on one who has mastered the technique of wielding them. Though perhaps a bit effete, these swords are highly sought after.
column3: Dancing Blade любимы мастерами изящных убийств. В руках хорошо обученного воина они становятся быстрыми и смертоносными, позволяют действовать более ловко и проворно не только в атаке, но и уклоняясь от ударов. Пусть таким клинкам не хватает веса, зато они бьют без промаха.

column2: Grants the user invisibility for 60 seconds.
Grants user Health and Mana regeneration.
Grants user increased Movement Speed for 30 seconds.
After obtaining this item, the recipe may be re-purchased to upgrade it. ^rCan be upgraded 4 times.^*
Cast to deal massive Magic Damage to a target.\n^rCan be upgraded 4 times.^*

The antiquarian monks of the Merugian Order, long since vanished from Newerth, are known for the illuminated manuscripts hidden in their far-flung monasteries. Filled with the uncovered secrets of the Ancients, a Merugian Codex can help one gain a better understanding of the world, so much so that he grows in all abilities and even combat prowess. Moreover, the books contain devastating sorceries derived from Ancient technology.

A tool used by the Beboliths of the Eighth Circle to strip the flesh from their victims, a Flayer can also be used as a weapon by any warrior with a strong enough stomach. With its razor-sharp double blades and cruel, hooked prongs, the weapon is dangerous under normal circumstances and virtually lethal when it strikes the occasional critical blow.
Applies an ^oaura^* to all nearby allies. This aura does not stack with itself or items it builds into.
The ^gLifesteal^* from the aura stacks with other Lifesteal modifiers but only works on ^gMelee^* heroes.
Grants allied melee units a lifesteal aura.
Changes aura target scheme to Ally Heroes.
Changes aura target scheme to Ally Heroes.
Changes aura target scheme to Ally Units.
Consumes a charge when used. Gains a charge when bought and ^cevery 120 seconds^* (2 minutes). Maximum of ^c2 charges^*.
Kills the target creep and gives bonus gold.

By plunging the Alchemist's Bones into ones own flesh, a warrior can gain the power to transform lesser creatures into solid gold.  The strange powers of this necrotic gift also instill an almost hyperactive energy to their host, which manifests itself in frenetic attacks.
^oKills^* target enemy creep. ^oGold^* earned from the kill is ^omultiplied by 3^*, while experience earned from the kill is multiplied by 1.75.
Applies a ^oHealth Regeneration aura^* to nearby allies. This aura does not stack with itself or items it builds into.

Although not all of the secrets of these Ancient tools have been unlocked, Astrolabes enhance one's abilities, bestow protection and regeneration, and can be activated to give greater protection and even swifter healing.
Heals allies in radius for ^o200 Health^* instantly. This effect can only be applied once every 25 seconds.
This item's Magic Armor Penetration does not stack with itself.
User ignores 60% of the target's Magic Armor.
\nCauses any Magic Damage you deal to ^oignore 60% of your target's Magic Armor^*.
Dealing Magic Damage causes additional damage based on target's health.

^oWhen you deal Magic Damage^* to a player-controlled unit, applies a debuff that deals ^o5% of target's current Health^* in Magic Damage per second and ^oreduces health regeneration by 50%^* for 3 seconds.

Debuff damage is reduced to 33% if you deal DoT damage instead.

Spell Sunder's debuffs do not stack with itself or activate from its own DoT.
Deals 1.67% of the target's current HP in damage every second.
Deals 5% of the target's current HP in damage every second.
This item contains a passive ^yMagic Armor^* bonus which does not stack with other ^yMagic Armor^* items.
^oMagic Armor Modifier^*\nCast to shield allies in a magic-absorbing barrier.
Applies ^oBarrier^* to targets in radius for ^o8 seconds^*. ^oNon-hero units^* receive a shield of ^otwice the strength^*.\n\nBarrier cannot affect a unit more than once every 50 seconds.
This item's ^yHealth Regeneration bonus^* does not stack with itself.
Adds high Health and Strength. Adds Health regen based on your max Health.
Torn from a Behemoth moments before its death, a Behemoth's Heart provides some of the incredible strength, Health, and recovery of the creature of which it was once a part.
Use to sacrifice 175 Health to gain 100 Mana.

On use, ^oconsumes 175 Health^* and ^ogrants 100 Mana^*.

^oRecovers^* the consumed health if an ^oenemy hero dies^* within range in the next 15 seconds. If not used, an enemy death will, instead, ^ocharge^* the Blood Chalice.

If charged, using the chalice will consume the charge instead of health. Max of ^c1 charge^*.
If an enemy hero is killed in 1000 radius, user gains 150 Health. This state then expires.

This item contains ^yBashing^* properties. Items and abilities with ^yBashing^* properties contain a shared cooldown time.\n\nThis effect propagates to illusions for 33% of power but does not apply the Stun.
^oBash Modifier^*\nGrants a chance to Stun your target on attack.

Favored by the most primal Beast warriors, Brutalizers are simple, spiked clubs used to bash an opponent into submission.  They strengthen the wielder and inflict significant damage, occasionally knocking a foe senseless.
^o25% chance^* to deal 35 Bonus Physical Damage to target and ^oStun for 1.4 seconds^*.
^o10% chance^* chance to deal 35 Bonus Physical Damage to target and ^oStun for 1.4 seconds^*.
^o25% chance^* for ^gMelee^* units to deal 35 Bonus Physical Damage to target and ^oStun for 1.4 seconds^*.\n\n^o10% chance^* for ^gRanged^* units.
Cast Chain Lightning every 5th attack.\n\nWhen someone hits you for 150 or more damage, this item loses a charge.
This item's chance to trigger on attack does not stack with ^oThunderclaw^*, ^oLightning Stone^*, or itself.\n\nDoes not propagate to illusions.
^09990 Attack Speed^*\n^oLightning Modifier^*\nShoot Lightning every few hits.

Certain skilled artisans have been able to cobble together bits of Ancient machinery and forge them into weapons. The terrible Charged Hammers, whose electrical current bestows speed to the wielder and excruciating pain to the victim, are a pinnacle of this technique. Their true potency is demonstrated when the lightning trapped within surges forth and dances from one target to the next, leaving behind sizzling corpses.

Starts with 4 charges. On attack, removes a charge. When 0 charges remain, the next attack deals ^obonus 225 Magic Damage^* and applies a ^omini-slow^*.

Bounces to up to ^otwo nearby enemy heroes^*.

Charges are then reset to 4. Not attacking for 5 seconds will remove a charge.
This item contains a ^yLightning Modifier^* which does not stack.\n\nThis effect propagates to illusions for 33% of power.
^09990 Attack Speed^*\n^oLightning Modifier^*\nShoot Lightning every few hits.

Certain skilled artisans have been able to cobble together bits of Ancient machinery and forge them into weapons. The terrible Arclight Crown, whose electrical current bestows speed to the wielder and excruciating pain to the victim, are a pinnacle of this technique. Their true potency is demonstrated when the lightning trapped within surges forth and dances from one target to the next, leaving behind sizzling corpses.

When 0 charges remain, deals ^o180 Bonus Magic Damage^* and applies a ^omini-slow^*. Bounces to up to ^otwo nearby enemy heroes^*.\n\nCharges are then reset to 3. Removes a charge on each attack, after 5 seconds of not attacking or when someone hits you for 100 or more damage.
Applies a ^opositive armor aura^* to nearby allied units and structures and a ^onegative armor aura^* to nearby enemy units and structures.\n\nPower of the aura can be swapped on use.
Grants an armor and attack speed aura to allies. Reduces armor of enemies.

Daemonic Breastplates carry within them damned souls shrieking out for blood sacrifices. These spirits help defend not only the wearer but his allies, but far more importantly weaken the defenses of foes and accelerate the attacks of the wearer and any nearby friends.

Currently in ^gEnemy Mode^*

On use, swaps between Ally or Enemy mode.

In ^gAlly mode^*, passively grants:
Allies: ^o+7 Armor/20 Attack Speed^*
Enemies: ^o-3 Armor^*

In ^gEnemy mode^*, passively grants:
Allies: ^o+3 Armor/20 Attack Speed^*
Enemies: ^o-7 Armor^*

Currently in ^gEnemy Mode^*

On use, swaps between Ally or Enemy mode.

In ^gAlly mode^*, passively grants:
Allies: ^o+7 Armor/20 Attack Speed^*
Enemies: ^o-3 Armor^*

In ^gEnemy mode^*, passively grants:
Allies: ^o+3 Armor/20 Attack Speed^*
Enemies: ^o-7 Armor^*

Currently in ^gAlly Mode^*

On use, swaps between Ally or Enemy mode.

In ^gAlly mode^*, passively grants:
Allies: ^o+7 Armor/20 Attack Speed^*
Enemies: ^o-3 Armor^*

In ^gEnemy mode^*, passively grants:
Allies: ^o+3 Armor/20 Attack Speed^*
Enemies: ^o-7 Armor^*
On attack, grants a chance to deal a critical strike, multiplying your damage.\n\nAfter obtaining this item, the recipe may be re-purchased to upgrade it. ^rCan be upgraded 3 times.^*
Grants a chance to deal critical strikes on attack.\n^rCan be upgraded 3 times.

When Hellbourne rifts are closed, they leave behind unhealed scars that taint the land for years. Daemon and mortal alike have discovered that Riftshards harvested from this unholy ground can be used as powerful enhancements to weapons, especially given their occasional tendency to explode for massive damage.\n\nAfter obtaining this item, the recipe may be re-purchased to upgrade it. Can be upgraded three times.
This item contains a ^oLifesteal Modifier^* which does not stack.
^oLifesteal Modifier^*\nActivate to gain Attack Speed, Movement Speed and Lifesteal.

Once, Elder Parasites were borne upon a plaguewind that swept out from the lost cities of the Ancients, bringing a time of madness and butchery to mankind. Now they are quite rare, but ironically prized-the vampirism and Berzerker strength they impart are valuable to those fighting for dominance of Newerth.
This item contains a passive ^yMovement Speed^* bonus which does not stack with itself or other boots.\n\nThis item can be ^tdisassembled^*.
^oMovement Modifier^*\n70 Movement Speed. Use for unitwalking and more speed.

Ghost Marchers not only provide a significant boost to one's speed but also contain clever springs that help the wearer both inflict and shrug off damage. Moreover, these springs can provide occasional quick bursts of speed to get one out of a sticky situation.
Activate to return damage to attackers.
Applies ^oBarbed^* to self for ^r3.5 seconds (Blitz Mode)^*. Cooldown is also changed to ^r8 seconds^*.
Returns 80% of damage taken as True damage
Returns damage taken back to the inflictor
Even after an hour in fire, it's still cold.
Applies ^oChilled^* to target for ^o3.5 seconds^* if wielded by a ^gmelee^* hero, or ^o2 seconds^* if wielded by a ^granged^* hero. Adds one charge per application. Maximum of ^c2 charges^*.
Causes the Winged Courier to get a huge Movement Speed burst.
Activate to gain Max Movement Speed for 20 seconds.
Applies Burst to Winged Courier for 20 seconds.
An impenetrable shield surrounds this unit, protecting it from all damage and spells for 4 seconds.
Activate to become Invulnerable for 4 seconds.
Applies Courier Shield to Winged Courier for 4 seconds.
Causes the Winged Courier to fly to your hero and drop all items you own into your inventory if you have room.
Causes the Winged Courier to fly to your hero and drop all items you own into your inventory if you have room.
Causes the Winged Courier to fly back to the base.
Causes the Winged Courier to fly back to the base.
Flies to the nearest friendly well.
Applies a ^o-20% Attack Speed aura^* to enemy units within 900 radius.
This item contains an ^428Activation Modifier^*. Using this item disables other items with this modifier for the duration.
^428Activation Modifier^*\n Negative Attack Speed Aura. Activate to gain high Armor.
Instantly armors you, removing all Debuffs and applying ^oStalwart^* to you for ^o6 seconds^*.
This item's ^yMovement Speed^* bonus does not stack with itself or items it builds into.
^oFirebrand Modifier^*\nActivate to dispel and create two illusions of yourself.
Dispels buffs and debuffs from self, disjoints projectiles, and ^ospawns 2 illusions^* of yourself.\n\nIllusions deal 33% damage, take 350% damage, and last ^o20 seconds^*.
Looking into it, I see only fire.

Glistening with its own magical power, a Great Arcana staff is a favored weapon for many sorcerers, for it enhances their intellect and hastens their recovery of mystic strength.  Moreover, it strikes with great speed and lands a smarting blow.

On kill or assist, becomes ^ocharged^*.

A charged Sacrificial Stone gains ^o+3 to all stats^* and reduces ^o20 seconds from the respawn timer^*. If the wielder dies, the charge will be removed.

Shares cooldown with ^oPlated Greaves^* and ^oShield of the Five^*.

^rIn Mid Wars death timer reduction does not work but charges do not get removed on death.^*

Shares cooldown with ^oPlated Greaves^* and ^oShield of the Five^*.

On death, spends the charge to ^oreduce death time by 20 seconds^*.

^rIn Mid Wars death timer reduction does not work but charges do not get removed on death.^*
Reduces respawn time and armors up allies.

All it takes is the heart of an innocent--tormented to the point of despair before being ripped untimely from its host--to create the bleeding rock known as a Sacrificial Stone. These accursed but prized artifacts both bestow and restore Health and Magic, and boost the rate at which one learns from battle. Despite these many boons, only the most desperate warrior would claim such a thing.

Grants ^o+3 Armor^* to ally units and structures in radius for ^o60 seconds^*. If charged, also grants them but not self ^o+3 to all stats^*. Armor bonus is ^odoubled^* for the first ^o10 seconds^*.\n\nDoes not stack with Plated Greaves or Shield of the Five.

^oFreeze Modifier:^* Chilled.

This item's ^yMovement Speed^* bonus does not stack with itself or items it builds into.

This item can be ^tdisassembled^*.
^oFreeze, Firebrand Modifier^*\nGrants a powerful slowing attack and blazing fast speed.^*
A sword of ice and fire!
This item's ^yMovement Speed^* bonus does not stack with itself or items it builds into.
Applies ^oChilled^* to target for ^o3.5 seconds^* if wielded by a ^gmelee^* hero, or ^o2 seconds^* if wielded by a ^granged^* hero. Adds one charge per application. Maximum of ^c3 charges^*.
Cast to Silence & Perplex an enemy for 5 seconds.

Harvested in lands untouched by Newerth's sun, Hellflowers stink of death and are covered in burning thorns. They are prized despite this because the aroma heightens the intellect and induces a sort of battle-frenzy of rapid, powerful attacks. Moreover, the thorns' prick hastens the recovery of magical powers, and when the flower blooms, it sears an enemy's very soul.
Leaves a visible trail behind afflicted target

Passively ^oblocks 30 damage (20 for ranged)^* from enemy attacks if you have enough charges. Removes 5 charges when attacked by heroes, towers, or bosses, or 1 charges from non-hero units.

Gains a charge ^cevery 0.5 seconds^*. Maximum of ^c20 charges^*.

This item can be ^tdisassembled^*.
Grants Health, Health regeneration, and a high chance to block Attack Damage.

column3: Эффект(-ы) Helm of the Black Legion

column2: Whispered rumors speak of the Black Legion, a band of brutal and heartless warriors who destroyed any who betrayed King Maliken during his conquest of human lands. All that remains of this fabled legion are relics such as their horned, enchanted helmets, fiercely sought after by warriors who aspire to equal prowess. The helms boost Health and recovery and often deflect significant damage.

Gains a ^ocharge^* and applies ^oGift of the Goddess^* to self for ^o15 seconds^* if an ^oenemy hero dies^* within 1000 range.

Each charge grants ^o+1 Health Regeneration^* and ^o20% Mana Regeneration^*. Max of ^c25 charges^*.

50% of charges are lost on death, up to a maximum of 4 charges.

This item can be ^tdisassembled^*.
Grants bonus HP regen & mana regen per enemy hero death near you.

The most holy symbol of the Beast religion is the Icon of the Goddess Earth.  The reverence poured into these objects redounds to whomever possesses them, granting great Health and Magic, and helping to restore mystic energies and close wounds.
Activate to greatly increase Strength and damage while draining your own Health.

In the deep jungles, a degenerate race is said to have worshipped the Hellbourne with exotic and unnatural rites. The only evidence of this cult are Insanitarius masks. Donning one bestows immediate battle rag--increased strength and Attack Speed, the ability to shrug off minor wounds, and rapid recovery from injuries. And by whispering a secret phrase, the wearer can invoke truly Insane Strength.
Instantly replenishes ^o475 Health^* when ^otoggled on^* and applies ^oInsanitarius^* to self until toggled off.
^oToggles off^*, removing Insanitarius and 475 Health from self. The Health removal is non-lethal.
Instantly replenishes ^o475 Health^* when ^otoggled on^* and applies ^oInsanitarius^* to self until toggled off.
Applies a ^oHealth Regeneration aura^* to nearby allies. This aura does not stack with itself or items it builds into.\n\nThis item can be ^tdisassembled^*.

An old recipe known to Beast shamans for centuries, the Refreshing Ornament is a pouch full of herbs and minerals that bestow a variety of small powers. Such is the interaction of these ingredients that even bystanders find they heal more quickly when nearby.
Changes aura target scheme to Ally Heroes.
Changes aura target scheme to Ally Heroes.
Changes aura target scheme to Ally Units.
This item's ^yMana Burn^* effect does not stack with itself.
^79726 Agility^*\n^oMana Combustion Modifier^*\nBurns enemy mana and slows.
column3: ^79726 Ловкость^*\n^oМодификатор сжигания маны^*\nСжигает ману противника и уменьшает скорость его передвижения

column2: Forged on a plane of Hell devoid of matter or energy, the Nullfire Blade seeks always to destroy magic around it, whether by burning it out of a foe or stripping him of enchantments.  In addition, the vortex of emptiness it projects around itself bestows both speed and insight to one who wields it.
column3: Nullfire Blade выкованы в измерении Ада, где их очистили от материи и энергии. Прикосновение клинков уничтожает магию, ещё бурляющую в телах или принявшую вид заклинаний. Кроме того, от клинков веет такой пустотой, что владельцы забывают все лишние мысли, начиная быстрее двигаться и лучше думать.

column2: +200% Attack Damage vs summoned units and illusions
column3: =+200% урона по призванным воинам и иллюзиям

column3: Укажите врага, чтобы наложить на него ^oослабевающее уменьшение скорости передвижения на 60% на 4 сек.^

On kill or on assist, becomes ^ocharged^*.

250 Damage.\n^rDrops upon wielder's death.^*\n^rCannot be destroyed.^*

The ultimate craft work of Hellbourne smiths are Doom Bringer blades, so powerful that even the daemons themselves fear them. The swords, ensouled with the spirits of great but sinful warriors, are so proud that they will abandon a master who falls in battle rather than serve one they deem a failure.
\n^oThis item will drop on death if killed by an enemy player.^*

The Builders of the Legion of Man spent years perfecting Fortified Bracelets for the laboring folk of Newerth.  These wristbands give strength, as well as a dash of agility and quick wits: exactly what a worker needs to complete the arduous tasks set before him.  Warriors, however, often commandeer these relics for themselves.

After obtaining this item, the recipe may be re-purchased to upgrade it. ^rCan be upgraded 2 times.^*

Stock: 2/9 (Initial/Max)
Restock Time: 10 minutes
Use to summon two minions. Melee minion Reveals stealth.\n^rCan be upgraded 2 times.^*

Any with the patience to master a Puzzlebox gains great intelligence, and then finds himself charged with a boost of unholy strength. These artifacts, once unlocked, provide a gateway to the Abyss, and can be used to call forth enslaved daemons to do battle.

Spawns a ^oPuzzlebox Wizard^* and a ^oPuzzlebox Mauler^* under your control for ^o35 seconds^*.

Both Minions have {400,600,800} Health, {6,8,10} Armor, 11 Magic Armor, and {350,370,390} Movement Speed.

Deals {200,400,600} True Damage to the enemy unit that killed the Mauler.
Reveals Stealthed units and wards around the Puzzlebox Mauler.
Passively ^oreveals Stealthed units and Wards^* within ^o{300,650,1000} distance^*.
Burns Mana from target unit, damaging them based on how much Mana was burned.
Target an enemy unit to ^oburn up to {125,175,225} Mana^* and deal Magic Damage equal to Mana burnt.
Burns up to {125,175,225} Mana from target and deal Magic Damage equal to 100% of Mana burnt.
Increases nearby friendly units' Movement Speed and attack rate.
Passively grants nearby allies ^o{3,6,9}% Movement Speed^* and ^o{3,6,9} Attack Speed^*.
Upon activation, resets the cooldown of all abilities and items.
^oResets the cooldown^* of ^oall abilities and items^* of your owned units.\n\nThe cooldown of Restoration Stone is based on the amount of cooldown reset + 30 seconds and a maximum of 210 seconds.
Shares cooldown with Sorcery Boots.\n\nThis item can be ^tdisassembled^*.
When activated, replenishes 135 mana to self and nearby allies.

Though many debate whether there is truly magic on Newerth or merely secrets and half-understood technology that outstrip mortal comprehension, Rings of Sorcery are considered magical by most, for they not only provide limited protection but also bestow enormous reserves of Mana and can rapidly replenish an exhausted sorcerer's power.
^oReplenishes 135 Mana^* to self and allies in radius.
Shares cooldown with Ring of Sorcery.
column3: Имеет общее время восстановления с Ring of Sorcery.
