column2: When activated, replenishes 160 mana to self and nearby allies.
column3: При использовании, восполняет 160 маны вашему герою и союзникам поблизости.

column2: ^oReplenishes 160 Mana^* to self and allies in radius.
column3: ^oВосполняет 160 маны^* вашему герою и союзникам в радиусе действия.

column2: Applies a ^omana regeneration and Armor aura^* to nearby allies. This aura does not stack with itself or items it builds into.\n\nThis item can be ^tdisassembled^*.
Grants a minor Armor and mana regeneration aura.

Many sages who ply the mystic arts take on apprentices from time to time. In such cases, Rings of the Teacher are commonly seen flashing on their fingers, for these curious relics restore the magical powers of those around the wielder and provide a small defensive aura to protect against misfiring rituals. They also give off a small electrical charge for chastising idle pupils, a popular feature.
Changes aura target scheme to Ally Heroes.
Changes aura target scheme to Ally Heroes.
Changes aura target scheme to Ally Units.
Consumes a charge on use. Gains a charge ^cevery 16 seconds^* unless in use, up to ^c2 charges^*.\n\nThis item can be ^tdisassembled^*.
Use to grant stealth. Holds 2 charges. Attacking out of stealth grants bonus damage and slow.
This mystical blade was crafted by a master assassin. It seems to whisper at you.
Applies ^oMaster Assassin's Stealth^* to self for ^o11 seconds^*.
Next attack deals 125 bonus damage and applies a 55% Movement Speed Slow for 3 seconds
Does not grant splash damage to ranged attacks.\n\nThis item can be ^tdisassembled^*.
Melee heroes gain splash damage on attack. Ranged heroes do not benefit.

Forged by craftsmen in the Cult of Ambias--master smiths of all races who have abandoned all allegiances to devote themselves to their art--Runed Cleavers are truly amazing weapons. In great, cleaving strokes, they inflict massive damage, not only to a target but to surrounding enemies, while healing the wielder and restoring his mystic energies.
Applies ^o60% cleave damage^* in radius of 275.

Passively grants ^oTrue Strike^* which causes your attacks to never miss.

On attack, grants a ^o33% chance^* to deal ^o140 Bonus Physical Damage^* to target and Stun for 0.1 seconds.

This effect propagates to illusions for 33% of power but does not apply the Stun.
Grants a chance to Mini-Stun on attack.\nGrants True Strike

Long possessed solely by the greatest chieftains of the barbarian tribes, Savage Maces are among the most prized weapons for any warrior, Man, Beast, or Hellbourne. These axes inflict massive damage at great speed and often smash into their target with such force as to inflict extra injury.
This item contains a passive ^yMagic Armor^* bonus which does not stack with other ^yMagic Armor^* items.\n\nThis item can be ^tdisassembled^*.
Adorned with the feathers of the six holy birds of the Beast Horde, a Shaman's Headdress bestows mystic protection while simultaneously revitalizing the wearer and mending his wounds.
Shares cooldown with ^oPlated Greaves^* and ^oSacrificial Stone^*.
Activate to grant nearby allies bonus Armor.

Each of the five disciples of the Blind Prophet possessed a mighty shield that would enhance his abilities, protect him, and--when called upon--protect those around him. Although what are now called Shields of the Five are not authentic relics of this heroic band, they have been crafted to provide the same benefits.
Applies ^oCourage^* to allied units and structures in radius for ^o60 seconds^*. Armor bonus is ^odoubled^* for the first ^o10 seconds^*.\n\nDoes not stack with Plated Greaves or Sacrificial Stone.
Applies an ^oarmor aura^* to nearby allies or a ^onegative armor aura^* to nearby enemies based on the mode it is switched into. This aura does not stack with itself or items it builds into.
Grants 4 Armor to nearby Allies or removes 4 Armor from nearby Enemies.
When an ^oenemy hero dies^* within 1000 radius of you, Soultrap gains a charge.\n\nEach use consumes 1 charge. Max of ^c3 charges^*.
Charge with hero deaths. Use charges to heal.
Target an ally (or self) to heal them for ^o400 Health over 12 seconds^*. Taking damage from non-Lane-Creeps dispels the effect.
Dispelled upon taking Damage from non-Lane-Creeps
Use to grant stealth for 11 seconds. Great for initiating and escaping.

Legend says that the robes called the Assassin's Shroud were modeled on the accursed garb of the man who struck down the Blind Prophet of Sol centuries ago.  Many disagree, noting that a woman killed the Prophet, but whatever its origin, the Shroud bestows more lethal and faster attacks, and gives one the power to fade into shadows and disappear.
Applies ^oAssassin's Stealth^* to self for ^o11 seconds^*.
This item contains an ^428Activation Modifier^*. Using this item disables other items with this modifier for the duration.
^428Activation Modifier^* Activate to temporarily grant complete immunity to Magic.
A grim relic of the war between the Beast Horde and the Legion of Man, Shrunken Heads bestow the strength of the dead warrior from which they were carved, and protect against hostile enchantments.
Dispels debuffs and grants ^oMagic Immunity^* to self for ^o7 seconds^*.
Generates extra income if not killing units.
Passively builds ^o1 charge every 10 seconds^* if a real ally hero is within 4000 range of you. Each charge is worth ^o10 gold^*.
Generates extra gold when not killing creeps
Activate to consume all charges and ^ogain gold^* equal to their value.
This item's ^yMovement Speed^* bonus does not stack with itself or items it builds into.
^oFirebrand Modifier^*\nBoosts your agility, movement speed, and attack speed.

Slash is an assassin's dagger that gives one the agility and attacking speed to inflict quick, accurate blows, and the Movement Speed to escape afterwards.  Despite these helpful traits, the weapon itself inflicts little damage, and is perhaps most effective as a charm.
I need to use a glove just to hold it.

Forged from spirits torn untimely from their bodies, Soulscream Rings are both a blessing and curse. Anyone depraved enough to wear one gains some portion of the abilities and powers of the souls bound within, but must endure the endless shrieking of those victims. Of course, such howling leaves one especially alert and quick on his feet.
Boosts the abilities of many heroes.\n\nThis item can be ^tdisassembled^*.
Boosts the abilities of many heroes. Check your ability tooltips for compatibility.
^gThis item can be activated to select a different effect on certain heroes^*

Those most immersed in the secret arts of Newerth, Man and Beast alike, bear a winged Staff of the Master as a mark of their rank.  Thought perhaps a sign of some conspiratorial order, it is more likely carried out of the desire to gain the intelligence, Health, and Mana of the staffs, and the ambition to unlock its secret powers.
Boosts the abilities of many heroes.
Boosts the abilities of an ally hero.

Activate and target another ally hero to ^opermanently boost their abilities^* with any Staff of the Master effects they may have.\n\n^oThis can only be done once^* and only on heroes who aren't already boosted. Losing the item will remove the boost from the ally and put the item on a 5 minute cooldown.
Abilities boosted with Staff of the Master effects.
This item contains a passive ^yMovement Speed^* bonus which does not stack with itself or other boots.\n\nThis item can be ^tdisassembled^*.
^oMovement Modifier^*\n60 Movement Speed. Can cycle between stat bonuses.

In many ways the paragon of military footwear, Steamboots improve not only marching speed but also a warrior's rate of attack. Most amazingly of all, however, by turning a dial on the boots' heel, they can be set to bestow agility, strength, or even intelligence. Truly, a mechanical marvel!
The ^gMovement Speed^* bonus on this item stacks with itself and other movement speed items.\n\nThis item can be ^tdisassembled^*.
Cast to envelop the target hero in an invulnerable cyclone for 2 seconds.

Ever since the War of the Ancients, wild Stormspirits have scourged the surface of Newerth. With the right rituals and words of binding, a Stormspirit can be bound as a familiar, bestowing enhanced magical powers, the spirit's own speed, and the ability to call forth the winds against one's foes.
Applies ^oCycloned^* to target hero for ^o2 seconds^*.\n\nAfter it ends, applies ^oWindswept^* to the target for ^o1 second^*.

Modeled after Ancient devices described in books of lore, Sustainers feed life and energy directly into whomever wears them. Moreover, the heightened state brought on by the surging powers of the Sustainer makes warriors strike stronger blows against their foes.
This item does not get negated by Null Stone.
column3: Эффект предмета не отменяется Null Stone.

Those who fail in the study of Newerth's secrets, yet nevertheless find favor in the eyes of their masters, are often given Talismans of Exile. These bestow modest magical strength fit for an apprentice as well as certain limited powers that might help the exiled one survive in a hostile world.
This item contains a ^yLightning Modifier^* which does not stack.\n\nThis effect propagates to illusions for 33% of power.
^oLightning Modifier^*\nUnleash an AOE every few attacks.

Cut from the limb of a rare creature that lurks in the fetid swamps of the west, Thunderclaws have long been a favorite weapon of the Beast Horde. The jolting energy within gives new agility to whoever holds one and inflicts searing pain on any enemy it strikes. In rare circumstances, some linkage of the wielder's own lifeforce and the necrotic Thunderclaw results in a blast of energy that electrocutes nearby foes.
When 0 charges remain, deals ^o120 Magic Damage^* in a 275 AOE around the target.\n\nCharges are then reset to 2. Removes a charge on each attack or after 5 seconds of not attacking.
This item contains a ^yLightning Modifier^* which does not stack.\n\nThis effect propagates to illusions for 33% of power.

Grants an aura that deals Magic Damage over time to nearby enemies.

Few remain of the eighteen mighty hammers forged by the fabled Beast shaman Torgash. Known as his Mocks because they were said to mock the efforts of humanity to resist the Beast Horde, these powerful weapons glow with inner power, burning nearby enemies.
On use, turns off the aura.
On use, turns off the aura.
On use, turns on the aura.
^77950 Intelligence^*\nCast to temporarily transfigure an enemy, disabling them.

Few shamanic implements are as unnerving as Totems of Kuldra: living, speaking, writhing staves that impart wisdom, strength, and speed and help their masters tap into the hidden flows of Mana and thus restore their power more speedily. Despite these ample benefits, most humans are loath to wield the pagan tools.
Applies ^oTransfigured^* to target for ^o3.5 seconds^*. Instantly kills enemy illusions and dispels stealth.
Base Movement Speed set to 100\nNegates Evasion
This item contains a ^oLifesteal Modifier^* which does not stack.\n\nThis item can be ^tdisassembled^*.
^oLifesteal Modifier^*\nGrants lifesteal and the ability to mind control enemy units.

Whispering Helms are gifts from the Hellbourne to their corrupted lieutenants. Although the helmets provide both armor and enhanced attacking power, as well as the ability to drain the life out of an enemy, it is the spirits within the helms-which both drive the wearer mad and can be called upon to dominate the minds of lesser creatures-that are most terrifying.
^oDominates the target^*, taking control of it and switching its team permanently. The unit gains 1 Mana Regen and bonus Damage and Movement Speed equal to 25% of your own.
Passively grants ^o100 Attack Range^* to ^granged^* heroes or ^ounitwalking and 10 Movespeed^* to ^gmelee^* heroes.
This item contains ^yEvasion^* properties. Evasion properties do not stack.\n\nThis item can be ^tdisassembled^*.
Grants high agility, ^yEvasion^*, and a different effect if Melee or Ranged.

Wingbows are the finest bows the Beast Horde ever crafted.  Imbued with the blessings of each of the New Gods and pungent with oils and herbal decoctions, these weapons bestow amazing agility to one who wields them, such that his attacks will almost always go true.
On use, toggles ^oUnitwalking^* on or off.

Passively applies ^oFreeze^* to target for ^o3 seconds^* when attacking or casting a single-target ability.\n\nFreeze applies a ^o35% Movement Speed Slow^* if wielded by a ^gmelee^* hero, or a ^o20% Movement Speed Slow^* if wielded by a ^granged^* hero.
^oFreeze Modifier^*\nYour attacks and single-target spells slow enemies.
My blood freezes when I hold it...

One of the New Gods worshipped by the beasts is the Frostwolf, a fabled creature personifying cold vengeance. In his honor, the frozen heads of white wolves are fashioned into totems known as Frostwolf's Skulls. These holy skulls grant a freezing attack, enormous growth in all abilities, and greater Health and magical potential.
Releases a ring of ice that deals ^o100 Magic Damage^* to enemies in radius and applies ^oFreeze^* for ^o4 seconds^*.
When activated, damages and slows enemy units in a radius.\nApplies an aura to all nearby enemy units with the following effect:\n-20% Attack Speed
Grants an aura to reduce enemy attack speed. Activate to freeze nearby enemies.

In the bitterly cold northern reaches of Newerth, enterprising scholars have found a means to forge armor from ice itself. The famous Frostfield Plate armor not only keeps its wearer's mind bracingly alert, it also chills and slows any nearby foe. Perhaps most remarkably, at the flip of a switch the armor can release the explosive cold stored within.
Releases a ring of ice that deals 200 Magic Damage to enemies in radius and applies Frostfield for 4 seconds.\n\nGrants 800 day and night Clearvision around self on cast for 2 seconds.
Use to heal target 1200 Health and 900 Mana over 20 seconds.
column3: Используйте для восстановления цели 1200 ед. здоровья и 900 маны за 20 сек.

column3: Особо качественное снадобье из лучших лечебных трав, позволяющее за небольшое время восполнить силы раненному бойцу.

column2: ^gHas no cooldown in Mid Wars^*.\n\nApplies ^oRejuvenation Potion^* to target for ^o20 seconds^*, restoring ^o1200 Health^* and ^o900 Mana^* over the duration.

column2: Dispelled upon taking Damage from non-Lane-Creeps
column3: Эффект рассеивается при получении урона от существ не с линии.

Double-activate (or target self) to consume this item and ^opermanently gain 35 damage^*. This effect stacks.

Passively collects a charge for every hero kill or assist that you get, permanently gaining ^o3 bonus Attack Damage per charge^*, up to a max of ^c5 charges^* (15 Attack Damage).\n\nWhen 5 charges are reached, also grants ^o15 Bonus Movement Speed^*.
Collects damage for hero kills and assists.
The Accessories Shop contains a number of trinkets and treasures that primarily provide a boost to basic stats.
Initiation recipes build mostly basic items for Heroes first starting their adventures.
Supportive recipes build items that are useful for helping your team.
Protective recipes build items that generally increase survivability.
Combative recipes build items that add to a Hero's combat prowess, improving damage output.
Morph Attack recipes build items that modify or add various properties to a Hero's attack.
The Relics Shop contains various rare artifacts that have many different effects.
Shady and mysterious, the Secret Shop contains many rare and powerful artifacts.
The Supplies Shop is home to many goods and potions that are generally consumed upon use.
The Weapons Shop contains various Armor and weapons that generally increase Damage or Armor.

Charges up for a duration, then lets out a powerful blast that travels in a straight line.
Charges up for a duration, then slams the ground in front of himself, dealing damage to those hit.

Throws rock at target location (200 radius) that lands after 2 seconds. Deals [150 + 10% of target's Max Health] in Magic Damage and stuns for 2 seconds.

Kongor will randomly use this ability as long as he is fighting at least 1 enemy hero (20% chance every second).

This ability also provides Kongor with his passive bonuses and upgrading.

Throws rock at target location (200 radius) that lands after 2 seconds. Deals [150 + 10% of target's Max Health] in Magic Damage and stuns for 2 seconds.

Kongor will randomly use this ability as long as he is fighting at least 1 enemy hero (20% chance every second).

Slows the Movement Speed and Attack Speed of all nearby players. Only used when 3 or more units are in melee range of Kongor.
Slows the Movement Speed and Attack Speed of all nearby players. Only used when 3 or more units are in melee range of Kongor.

When not on cooldown, blocks the next targeted spell and goes on cooldown.
